description_en:
Experience the **Pigeon SofTouch** Glass Bottle 240 ml, expertly designed to support your baby's natural feeding journey and minimize colic.

âœ¨ Product Features:
â­ Allows baby to use the natural feeding motion learned at the breast.
â­ SofTouchâ„¢ Peristaltic PLUS Nipple is 100% silicone, super soft and flexible to allow for natural and smooth tongue movement.
â­ Air Ventilation System (AVSâ„¢) reduces intake of gas, a potential cause of colic.
â­ Bottle shape is easy to hold, featuring specially designed roll-free bottle hoods.
â­ Crafted from premium borosilicate glass material with excellent transparency and high heat resistance.
â­ BPA Free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon SofTouch**:
â­ Ensure the bottle and nipple are clean before each use.
â­ Follow recommended sterilization guidelines for baby bottles.
â­ Assemble the bottle carefully.
â­ Use with breast milk or formula for your baby's feeding.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon SofTouch**:
â­ High-quality borosilicate glass.
â­ 100% soft and flexible silicone for the nipple.
â­ Air Ventilation System (AVSâ„¢).

description_en:
Soothe your little one during teething with the **Pigeon Baby Teether Triangle Shaped N622 P368**. Specially designed to alleviate discomfort, this innovative teether stimulates the development of your baby's mouth and fingers safely. Its ideal triangle shape makes it easy to grasp, allowing your baby to chew and hold it with ease. Filled with safe, sterilized water, the **Pigeon Baby Teether Triangle Shaped N622 P368** provides complete peace of mind with every use. Its soft silicone material has a reduced effect on teeth growth and alignment, offering a psychologically stabilizing and calming effect on your baby.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon Baby Teether Triangle Shaped N622 P368**
â­ Before first use, wash the teether with warm water and mild soap, then rinse thoroughly.
â­ Can be chilled in the refrigerator (not the freezer) for extra soothing relief.
â­ Inspect the teether regularly for any signs of damage or leakage.
â­ Clean the teether after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon Baby Teether Triangle Shaped N622 P368**
â­ High-quality silicone, safe for baby's health.
â­ Sterilized and tested water.
â­ BPA-free materials.

description_en:
Discover unparalleled comfort with the **Pigeon** Minilight Pacifier, featuring a charming rabbit design, specifically crafted for your baby's comfort during the crucial 0-6 month period. As the lightest pacifier ever, it ensures maximum ease for your little one. Its innovative design allows for enhanced airflow, complemented by safety vents in the shield for superior protection. The super-soft silicone nipple is shaped for a natural fit in the baby's mouth, supporting healthy oral development. Its unique shape promotes natural nasal breathing, contributing to your baby's overall well-being. Experience peace of mind with **Pigeon**, the leading Japanese brand in baby care products.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon** Minilight Pacifier (Rabbit) 0-6 Months
â­ Before first use, wash the pacifier thoroughly with soap and water and dry.
â­ Sterilize the pacifier regularly by boiling in water for 5 minutes or using a sterilizer.
â­ Always inspect the pacifier before use. Discard if any signs of damage or wear appear.
â­ Choose the appropriate size for your baby's age to ensure comfort and safety.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon** Minilight Pacifier (Rabbit) 0-6 Months
â­ High-quality, food-grade silicone, BPA-free.
â­ Safe and soft material for delicate baby skin.
â­ Durable construction designed for repeated use.

Made from 100% pure natural cotton, **Pigeon Cotton Ball 100 pcs** is extremely soft and gentle on sensitive skin, making it the ideal choice for daily care. With its high absorbency and hygienic properties, these cotton balls are perfect for a wide range of uses, from complete baby care and skincare to meeting the needs of the entire family.

â­ Use for gentle massage on delicate baby skin.

â­ Can be used with skincare products or for makeup removal.
â­ Enjoy a healthy and effective cleaning experience for all family members.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon Cotton Ball 100 pcs**
â­ 100% high-quality natural cotton.
â­ Free from harmful chemicals.

title_ar: Ø¨ÙŠØ¬ÙˆÙ† Ø³ÙˆÙØª ØªØ§ØªØ´ WN3 Ø­Ù„Ù…Ø§Øª Ø¨Ø³ØªØ±Ø© - 2 Ù‚Ø·Ø¹Ø© (ØªØ¯ÙÙ‚ Ø¨Ø·ÙŠØ¡)
description_en:
**Pigeon Softouch WN3 Nipple Blister Pack** is the ideal solution to support a natural and smooth feeding experience for your baby. Developed with over 60 years of research, these nipples are designed to mimic natural breastfeeding, ensuring a seamless transition between breast and bottle feeding without causing nipple confusion. It features a super-soft, flexible 100% silicone nipple that closely resembles a mother's breast, promoting natural tongue movement and a proper latch. The advanced anti-colic air vent system effectively reduces swallowed air during feeding, helping to minimize discomfort and colic. Its design includes an additional latch-on line to ensure correct latch position, and a carefully shaped structure to perfectly fit a babyâ€™s mouth for easy and secure feeding. Each **Pigeon Softouch WN3 Nipple Blister Pack** is available in various flow sizes to suit your baby's different developmental stages, and it is easy to clean and sterilize to ensure the highest levels of safety and hygiene.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon Softouch WN3 Nipple Blister Pack**:
â­ Attach the **Pigeon Softouch WN3 Nipple Blister Pack** securely to a compatible Pigeon bottle.
â­ Ensure the nipple is properly positioned to allow milk to flow when pressure is applied.
â­ Hold the bottle at an appropriate angle to ensure the milk flows smoothly during feeding.
â­ Supervise your baby while feeding and adjust the nipple size as the babyâ€™s needs and development progress.
â­ Always supervise your baby during feeding to prevent choking or mishandling of the nipple.
â­ Do not use the nipple as a soother to avoid prolonged sucking, which may lead to tooth decay.
â­ Check the temperature of the milk before feeding to prevent burns or discomfort.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon Softouch WN3 Nipple Blister Pack**:
â­ Nipple is made from 100% silicone.
â­ Design mimics mother's breast to promote natural latching and smooth tongue movement.
â­ Advanced anti-colic air vent system to reduce swallowed air and minimize colic risk.
â­ Latch-on line and structure designed to perfectly fit babyâ€™s mouth for easy and secure feeding.

#PigeonNipples #PigeonFeeding #NaturalFeeding #BottleFeeding #BabyProducts #Newborn #BabyHygiene #BabyEssentials #EasyFeeding #SaudiBabies

description_en:
Experience a natural and comfortable feeding journey with **Pigeon Silicone Nipple Small**. Specifically designed to mimic a mother's nipple, these ultra-soft silicone nipples provide an exceptionally smooth texture that your baby will easily adapt to. Their superior flexibility allows for natural stretching, accommodating your baby's tongue movements for a seamless feeding experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon Silicone Nipple Small**

â­ Ensure the nipple is thoroughly cleaned and sterilized before first use and after each subsequent use.
â­ Securely attach the nipple to the neck of the feeding bottle.
â­ Hold the bottle at an angle during feeding so the nipple is filled with milk to prevent air swallowing.
â­ Replace the nipple if any signs of damage or wear appear.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon Silicone Nipple Small**

â­ Ultra-soft, pure silicone.
â­ BPA-free for your baby's safety.
â­ Anatomical design closely resembles a natural mother's nipple.
â­ Tear and collapse resistant.

description_en:
Discover ultimate oral hygiene for your little one with **Pigeon Baby Tooth & Gum Wipes - Strawberry**. These innovative wipes are specially designed to ensure oral hygiene at baby's early stages, offering a convenient and effective way to clean teeth and gums while your baby is asleep.

**Pigeon Baby Tooth & Gum Wipes - Strawberry** are extremely hygienic, with each wipe coming in an individually sterilized sachet for the highest cleanliness standards. They are completely free from alcohol, coloring, artificial fragrances, or preservatives, making them 100% safe for your baby's delicate gums.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon Baby Tooth & Gum Wipes - Strawberry**
â­ Gently use the wipe to clean your baby's teeth and gums.
â­ Can be used after feeding or before bedtime.
â­ Dispose of the wipe after use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon Baby Tooth & Gum Wipes - Strawberry**
â­ 100% food grade ingredients.
â­ Alcohol-free.
â­ Free from coloring agents.
â­ Free from artificial fragrances.
â­ Free from preservatives.

description_en:
Experience natural feeding with the **Pigeon** Glass Feeding Bottle with Handle 240ml. This bottle is designed to encourage natural, smooth tongue movement with its ultra-soft and flexible Peristaltic Nipple. The Air Ventilation System (AVSâ„¢) reduces air intake, helping to prevent colic. Crafted from high-quality borosilicate glass, it offers excellent transparency and superior heat resistance, and is completely BPA-free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon** Glass Feeding Bottle with Handle 240ml:
â­ Wash and dry all parts before first use.
â­ Follow standard sterilization instructions for baby bottles.
â­ Ensure the milk temperature is appropriate before giving the bottle to your baby.
â­ Replace the nipple if signs of wear or damage appear.
â­ Your baby can easily hold the bottle thanks to its ergonomic design.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon** Glass Feeding Bottle with Handle 240ml:
â­ Premium quality borosilicate glass.
â­ Ultra-soft and flexible silicone nipple (Peristaltic Nipple).
â­ Air Ventilation System (AVSâ„¢).
â­ BPA-Free.

description_en:
Experience the comfort and efficiency of the **Pigeon Breast Pump Plastic P259 Q803**, thoughtfully designed to support your motherhood journey. Enjoy a smooth breast milk extraction experience, aiding in milk supply stimulation for successful breastfeeding. The **Pigeon Breast Pump Plastic P259 Q803** is your perfect companion for storing milk for later use and preventing clogged ducts and painful engorgement. It can also be used to express excess or unsuitable milk, ensuring safety for both you and your baby. Furthermore, it gently and safely assists in drawing out flat or inverted nipples.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon Breast Pump Plastic P259 Q803**:
â­ Clean the pump thoroughly before use.
â­ Gently place the nipple into the flange.
â­ Begin squeezing the handle to extract milk.
â­ Store milk in sterile containers.
â­ Wash the pump after each use.

Introducing the **Pigeon** Minilight Pacifier in a charming ship design for boys, specifically crafted for babies aged 12-18 months. This pacifier is the lightest ever, featuring an innovative design that allows for increased airflow, ensuring ultimate comfort for your little one.

The ultra-soft silicone nipple is designed to be naturally captured by your baby's mouth, promoting healthy nasal breathing. The **Pigeon** Minilight pacifier is engineered in Japan for optimal oral development.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon** Minilight Pacifier - Ship Design for Boys (12-18 Months):
â­ Sterilize the pacifier by boiling in water for 5 minutes before first use.
â­ Ensure the pacifier is completely cool before giving it to your baby.
â­ Inspect the pacifier regularly for any signs of damage or wear.
â­ Replace immediately if any damage is observed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon** Minilight Pacifier - Ship Design for Boys (12-18 Months):

description_en:
Introducing the **Pigeon** Peristaltic Nipple, designed for a natural and comfortable feeding experience. Crafted from ultra-soft, high-quality silicone, this nipple features a unique super-stretchable design that mimics the natural peristaltic movement of a baby's tongue, ensuring an optimal latch.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon** Peristaltic Nipple:
â­ Sterilize before first use. Wash with warm, soapy water or use a baby product sterilizer.
â­ Ensure the nipple's flow rate is appropriate for your baby's age and feeding needs.
â­ Regularly inspect the nipple for any signs of wear and tear, and replace if damaged.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon** Peristaltic Nipple:
â­ Ultra-soft, food-grade silicone, free from BPA.
â­ Super-stretchable teat section with an accordion-like portion to allow for natural tongue movement.
â­ Dome-shaped base promotes natural mouth opening and gentle lip fitting.

description_en:
Introduce your baby to solids with ease using the **Pigeon Plastic Weaning Spoon Bottle** in a convenient 120 ml size. Perfect for feeding purees, soups, or porridges, this bottle allows you to control the amount of food dispensed by adjusting the pressure on the bottle. It also comes with a cleaning brush and is BPA-free for your baby's safety.

â­ Specially designed to facilitate the weaning process.
â­ Ideal for feeding semi-liquid foods like juices, soups, and purees.
â­ Allows for controlled food flow for a safe and comfortable feeding experience.
â­ Completely free from Bisphenol A (BPA) for your baby's well-being.
â­ Includes a dedicated cleaning brush for easy maintenance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon Plastic Weaning Spoon Bottle**:
â­ Fill the bottle with appropriate food for your baby.
â­ Gently squeeze the bottle to allow food to flow through the spoon.
â­ Squeeze harder to increase food flow as per your baby's need.
â­ Ensure the bottle and spoon are thoroughly cleaned after each use with the provided brush.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon Plastic Weaning Spoon Bottle**:
â­ Food-grade plastic, free from Bisphenol A (BPA).
â­ Soft silicone spoon, gentle on baby's gums.
â­ Protective cap for hygiene.
â­ Cleaning brush.

description_en:
Experience superior comfort with the **Pigeon Softouch Wn3 Nipple** - 2pcs (SS). These nipples are expertly designed to mimic natural breastfeeding, perfectly supporting natural latching, peristaltic tongue movement, and swallowing. This design ensures a smooth transition from breastfeeding to bottle-feeding, preventing nipple confusion and keeping your baby comfortable. Crafted from 100% soft and flexible silicone, the nipple features a new latch-on line to guide correct latching and a shape that ensures a secure and comfortable fit in your baby's mouth. The advanced anti-colic air vent system reduces gas intake, minimizing baby's colic and promoting a stress-free feeding experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon Softouch Wn3 Nipple**:
â­ Securely attach the **Pigeon Softouch Wn3 Nipple** to a compatible Pigeon wide-neck bottle.
â­ Ensure the nipple is correctly aligned to allow milk flow when pressure is applied.
â­ Hold the bottle at an appropriate angle to allow milk to flow smoothly.
â­ Supervise your baby during feeding and adjust the nipple size as your baby grows and their feeding needs change.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon Softouch Wn3 Nipple**:
â­ 100% soft and flexible silicone nipple that mimics a motherâ€™s breast, promoting natural latching and smooth tongue movement.
â­ Advanced air ventilation system that reduces gas intake, helping to minimize colic during feeding.
â­ Well-designed shape with a newly added latch-on line to guide correct latching and fit perfectly in the babyâ€™s mouth.

title_ar: Ø²Ø¬Ø§Ø¬Ø© Ø¥Ø±Ø¶Ø§Ø¹ Ø¨ÙŠØ¬ÙˆÙ† Ø³ÙˆÙØªÙˆØªØ´ Ø¨ÙŠØ¨ (Ø¨ÙˆÙ„ÙŠ Ø¨Ø±ÙˆØ¨ÙŠÙ„ÙŠÙ†) - 330 Ù…Ù„: Ø±Ø§Ø­Ø© ÙˆØ³Ù„Ø§Ø³Ø© Ù„Ø·ÙÙ„Ùƒ
description_en:
The Pigeon Softouch Bpp Nursing Bottle (Polypropylene) - 330ml is meticulously designed based on over 60 years of research into babyâ€™s natural sucking behavior, ensuring a seamless transition between breastfeeding and bottle feeding. The soft silicone nipple is crafted to mimic the comfort of a motherâ€™s breast, supporting your babyâ€™s natural feeding movements.

Pigeon Softouch Bpp Nursing Bottle (Polypropylene) - 330ml bottles feature an advanced air vent system that effectively reduces gas intake, significantly helping to prevent colic. The newly incorporated latch-on line serves as a guide for both mother and baby, promoting proper latch positioning for a comfortable feeding experience.

Constructed from durable and lightweight PP (Polypropylene) material, these BPA/BPS-free bottles are specifically engineered to support newborns. They come with an SS-size nipple that ensures a gradual and consistent milk flow, making feeding easier for babies with developing jaw muscles.

**Product Features:**
â­ Ultra-soft silicone nipple mimics the natural breast for enhanced comfort and flexibility.
â­ Advanced air vent system minimizes colic by reducing air intake.
â­ BPA/BPS free and made from durable, lightweight PP material for easy handling and cleaning.
â­ Safe, BPA/BPS-free construction ensures your baby's well-being.
â­ 330ml capacity is ideal for your baby's feeding needs.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon Softouch Bpp Nursing Bottle (Polypropylene) - 330ml**:
â­ Thoroughly wash the bottle and nipple with warm water and mild soap before the first use, then sterilize.
â­ Fill the bottle with the appropriate amount of milk or liquid for your baby.
â­ Securely attach the nipple to the bottle.
â­ Hold the bottle at an angle that keeps the nipple full of milk to minimize air swallowing.
â­ Ensure your baby latches onto the nipple correctly, using the latch-on line as a guide.
â­ After each feeding, clean the bottle and nipple thoroughly and sterilize to prevent bacterial growth.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon Softouch Bpp Nursing Bottle (Polypropylene) - 330ml**:
â­ Bottle: Made from high-quality Polypropylene (PP) â€“ lightweight, durable, and BPA/BPS-free.
â­ Nipple: Crafted from 100% natural silicone â€“ ultra-soft, flexible, and safe for your baby's health.

description_en:
Give your baby the best start in oral care with the **Pigeon Baby Training Toothbrush Set**. This unique set is designed to support your baby through every stage of learning to brush their teeth, from getting accustomed to the brush to mastering the technique.

â­ The set includes three training toothbrushes specifically designed for each stage.
â­ Soft, rounded bristles for gentle cleaning on a baby's delicate teeth and gums.
â­ A smooth, comfortable grip designed for easy handling and use by little hands.
â­ A safety shield integrated into Lessons 1 & 2 toothbrushes to provide maximum protection and prevent choking.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon Baby Training Toothbrush Set**:
â­ Lesson 1 Toothbrush: Allows the baby to learn and become accustomed to placing the toothbrush in their mouth.
â­ Lesson 2 Toothbrush: Refines the babyâ€™s brushing techniques.
â­ Lesson 3 Toothbrush: Helps the baby practice cleaning the back teeth effectively.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon Baby Training Toothbrush Set**:
â­ Lesson 1 Training Toothbrush with safety shield.
â­ Lesson 2 Training Toothbrush with safety shield.
â­ Lesson 3 Training Toothbrush.
â­ Safe, high-quality, BPA-free materials.

title_ar: Ø±Ø¶Ø§Ø¹Ø© Ø¨ÙŠØ¬ÙˆÙ† Ø§Ù„Ù…Ù„ÙˆÙ†Ø© Ù„Ù„Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ - 50 Ù…Ù„ | ØªØºØ°ÙŠØ© Ø¢Ù…Ù†Ø© ÙˆÙ…Ø±ÙŠØ­Ø©
description_en:
Introducing the **Pigeon Decorated Bottle 50 ml**, designed for a healthy start to your baby's independent eating habits. This feeding bottle encourages natural peristaltic tongue movement, ensuring maximum development of your baby's facial and jaw muscles. The **Pigeon Decorated Bottle 50 ml** features a unique air ventilation system that allows minimum air intake and easy gliding of milk into the baby's stomach, with a streamlined shape for easy holding and cleaning.

â­ Features a stretchable nipple for easy sucking and wide movement of the baby's tongue.
â­ Made with ultra-soft silicone rubber with double thickness, ensuring softness and flexibility.
â­ The nipple fits perfectly into the baby's tongue and encourages peristaltic tongue motion.
â­ The nipple can be adjusted to increase or decrease milk flow.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon Decorated Bottle 50 ml**
â­ Before first use, wash the bottle and nipple thoroughly with soap and water or in a dishwasher.
â­ Sterilize the bottle and nipple by boiling for 5 minutes or using a sterilizer.
â­ Ensure the nipple hole allows the appropriate milk flow for your baby's age.
â­ Adjust the nipple hole to increase or decrease milk flow as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon Decorated Bottle 50 ml**
â­ Nipple is made of 100% ultra-soft medical grade silicone.
â­ Bottle body is made from safe, BPA-free materials.

description_en:
Introducing the **Pigeon Minilight Pacifier**, designed for babies aged 6-12 months. This pacifier is the lightest ever, offering superior airflow for ultimate comfort. The super soft silicone nipple is perfectly shaped for your baby's natural mouth-capture. Its unique design promotes natural nasal breathing, contributing to your baby's overall well-being. Safety is paramount, with ventilation holes in the shield ensuring a secure experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon Minilight Pacifier**:
â­ Clean the pacifier before each use.
â­ Ensure it is dry before giving it to your baby.
â­ Replace the pacifier if any signs of damage appear.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon Minilight Pacifier**:
â­ High-quality, safe silicone.
â­ BPA-free material.

title_ar: Ø¨ÙŠØ¬ÙˆÙ† ÙØ±Ø´Ø§Ø© Ø£Ø³Ù†Ø§Ù† ØªØ¯Ø±ÙŠØ¨ÙŠØ© Ù„Ù„Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ - Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø±Ø­Ù„Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø£ÙˆÙ„Ù‰ (6-8 Ø£Ø´Ù‡Ø±)
description_en:
Introduce your little one to oral hygiene with the **Pigeon Baby Training Toothbrush**, meticulously crafted for their first stage of dental development. This innovative toothbrush is part of the Lesson 1-2-3 oral care range and is perfectly suited for babies aged 6 to 8 months, especially those who have started to sprout their first milk teeth. The thick, contoured handle is designed for easy gripping by tiny hands, while the soft, gentle elastomer rubber head provides soothing massage for sensitive gums. The **Pigeon Baby Training Toothbrush** is the ideal first step in introducing the concept of toothbrushing to your baby safely and enjoyably.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon Baby Training Toothbrush**:
â­ Use under adult supervision.
â­ Wash the brush thoroughly before first use and after each use.
â­ Gently massage your baby's gums with the soft rubber head.
â­ Once teeth appear, a tiny smear of fluoride-free toothpaste can be used.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon Baby Training Toothbrush**:
â­ Soft and safe elastomer rubber head.
â­ Gentle and soft bristles for gums.
â­ Thick, ergonomic handle for easy grip.
â­ BPA-free materials.

description_en:
Ensure a smooth weaning journey with the **Pigeon Plastic Weaning Bottle with Spoon**. Specially designed to serve semi-solid foods like juices, soups, or purees to your little one. The **Pigeon Plastic Weaning Bottle with Spoon** features a bottle design that allows you to easily control the amount your baby consumes by adjusting the squeezing pressure. This innovative bottle helps in serving food in an organized and enjoyable manner, making mealtime easier for both you and your baby. It also comes with a cleaning brush for effortless maintenance and is completely BPA-free to ensure your baby's safety.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon Plastic Weaning Bottle with Spoon**
â­ Open the top cap of the bottle.
â­ Fill the bottle with suitable food for your baby (juices, soups, purees).
â­ Close the top cap securely.
â­ Gently squeeze the bottle to dispense the appropriate amount of food through the spoon.
â­ Adjust the squeezing pressure to control the food flow.
â­ Use the included brush to clean the bottle after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon Plastic Weaning Bottle with Spoon**
â­ High-quality, food-grade plastic.
â­ BPA-free design.
â­ Soft spoon, gentle on baby's gums.
â­ Dedicated cleaning brush.

description_en:
Discover ultimate comfort for your little one with the **Pigeon Soft Touch** Anticolic Glass Bottle 240ml Decorated.

Designed to mimic natural feeding, this bottle provides your baby with a comfortable and smooth feeding experience, just like breastfeeding.

â­ Allows baby to use natural feeding motion learned at the breast.
â­ SofTouchâ„¢ Peristaltic PLUS Nipple is 100% silicone, super soft and flexible to allow for natural and smooth tongue movement.
â­ Air Ventilation System (AVSâ„¢) reduces intake of gas, a potential cause of colic, ensuring a calmer feeding experience for your baby.
â­ Bottle shape is easy to hold, perfect for little hands or yours.
â­ Bottle is made from premium borosilicate glass material with excellent transparency and high heat resistance.
â­ BPA Free for your baby's complete safety and well-being.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon Soft Touch** Anticolic Glass Bottle 240ml Decorated:
â­ Wash the bottle thoroughly with warm water and mild soap before first use.
â­ Sterilize the bottle before each feeding.
â­ Ensure the air vent on the nipple is positioned upwards during feeding.
â­ Never leave a baby unattended while feeding.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon Soft Touch** Anticolic Glass Bottle 240ml Decorated:
â­ Nipple: 100% medical-grade silicone, extra soft.
â­ Bottle: Premium borosilicate glass.
â­ Hood and Ring: Safe polypropylene.
â­ BPA-free materials.

description_en:
Experience the closest to natural breastfeeding with **Pigeon SofTouch Wn3** nipples.

Developed with over 60 years of research, **Pigeon SofTouch Wn3** nipples are designed to closely mimic natural breastfeeding, supporting both breast and bottle feeding without nipple confusion. The super-soft, flexible silicone nipple features a latch-on line for proper latching and a smooth transition between feeding methods.

The anti-colic air ventilation system helps reduce swallowed air, minimizing the risk of colic, while the nippleâ€™s structure supports natural sucking movements, promoting peristaltic tongue action and proper swallowing.

Available in various sizes for babies, the nipples are BPA and BPS-free, and clinically tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon SofTouch Wn3**:
â­ Attach the **Pigeon SofTouch Wn3** nipple to a compatible Pigeon bottle and ensure it is securely in place.
â­ Hold the bottle at an appropriate angle to allow milk to flow when there is pressure on the nipple.
â­ Allow your baby to suck on the nipple, which helps train their sucking ability as they control the flow of milk.
â­ Always supervise your baby while feeding and ensure the nipple is clean and sterilized before each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon SofTouch Wn3**:
â­ 100% silicone nipple for superior softness and flexibility.
â­ BPA and BPS-free for your baby's safety.
â­ Anti-colic air ventilation system.
â­ Latch-on line for correct latching.

#Pigeon #BabyNipples #NaturalFeeding #Newborns #BabyCare #SaudiArabia #InfantFeeding #BabyEssentials #MomAndBaby #HealthyBaby

Experience a unique drinking journey for your baby with the **Pigeon** Magmag Straw Cup - Stage 3. Specially designed to support a smooth transition from breastfeeding to drinking from cups, this cup is perfect for babies aged 8 months and above. It features a medium-sized Peristaltic PLUSâ„¢ nipple that recreates the natural sucking motion, ensuring ultimate comfort. The leak-proof and anti-slip design guarantees a safe and convenient drinking experience, and it's completely free from harmful BPA.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon** Magmag Straw Cup - Stage 3 (Blue) 200ml:
â­ Recommended for babies aged 8 months and older.
â­ Use the medium-flow nipple to support natural sucking motion.
â­ Ensure the lid is tightly closed to prevent leaks.
â­ Wash the cup regularly before and after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon** Magmag Straw Cup - Stage 3 (Blue) 200ml:
â­ High-quality, BPA-free plastic.
â­ Medical-grade silicone for the nipple.
â­ Durable and shatter-resistant materials.

description_en:
Experience ultimate convenience with the **Pigeon Powder Milk Container Transparent Color**, the perfect solution for feeding your baby with ease and confidence. This innovative container allows you to store the right amount of milk in each compartment separately, reducing worry and ensuring your baby gets optimal nutrition anytime, anywhere. Its lightweight and portable design makes it your ideal companion at home or while traveling, giving you the flexibility to choose between one, two, or three compartments based on your needs. Enjoy smooth, hassle-free feeding for your baby with the **Pigeon Powder Milk Container Transparent Color**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon Powder Milk Container Transparent Color**:
â­ Dispense the desired amount of milk powder into each compartment separately.
â­ Tightly close each compartment to ensure freshness.
â­ Choose the number of compartments you need (one, two, or three) based on your trip duration or your baby's needs.
â­ Safe for use and made from BPA-free materials.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon Powder Milk Container Transparent Color**:
â­ High-quality food-grade plastic, free from BPA.
â­ Transparent design for clear visibility of remaining milk quantity.
â­ Airtight lids for each compartment.
â­ Easy to clean and safe for repeated use.

Introducing the **Pigeon Minilight Pacifier**, designed for ultimate comfort and safety for your baby boy aged 6-12 months. This pacifier is the lightest ever, featuring a super soft silicone that fits perfectly in babyâ€™s mouth, promoting natural latching. Its innovative design allows for more airflow, encouraging natural nasal breathing for optimal health. The easy-hold button design makes it convenient for both baby and parent. Safety is paramount with breathing holes in the shield to ensure your babyâ€™s well-being.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon Minilight Pacifier**
â­ Before first use, sterilize the pacifier by boiling it in water for 5 minutes.

Discover a unique drinking experience with the **Pigeon Magmag Straw Cup Stage 3 (Pink) 200ml**. This innovative cup is designed to help your baby transition smoothly from breastfeeding to cup drinking. Featuring a medium-sized Peristaltic PLUSâ„¢ teat, it replicates the baby's natural sucking motion, providing a comfortable and natural drinking experience. The cup is designed to be leak-proof and non-slip, ensuring your baby's safety and ease of use. It is also BPA-free, prioritizing your baby's health and well-being.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon Magmag Straw Cup Stage 3 (Pink) 200ml**

description_en:
Experience effortless hydration on-the-go with the **Pigeon Tall Straw Water Bottle Blue - 300ml**. This innovative bottle boasts a large capacity within a slim design, making it incredibly convenient for outings. The easy-to-open and close straw hood ensures a mess-free experience, while the 5 slip-proof bumps provide a secure and comfortable grip. Sip with ease thanks to the soft, flexible straw, and enjoy the added versatility of a detachable handle. Designed to be leak-proof, you can trust that every drop stays contained. The **Pigeon Tall Straw Water Bottle Blue - 300ml** is also BPA-free, prioritizing your child's safety and well-being.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon Tall Straw Water Bottle Blue - 300ml**
â­ Easily flip open the straw hood to access for drinking.
â­ Securely close the hood to prevent any leaks.
â­ Enjoy a firm grip thanks to the anti-slip design.
â­ Use at home or while traveling for perfect hydration.
â­ Detach the handle for added convenience as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon Tall Straw Water Bottle Blue - 300ml**
â­ BPA-free and safe materials.
â­ Soft and flexible straw for comfortable sipping.
â­ Slim design for easy portability.
â­ Leak-proof cap for secure containment.
â­ Detachable handle for versatility.

description_en:
Ensure your baby's feeding experience is smooth and comfortable with the **Pigeon Silicon Nipple Meduim**. Crafted from premium, ultra-soft silicone, these nipples offer superior stretchability that mimics a mother's breast, providing unparalleled comfort. Their unique design supports natural tongue movement during feeding and prevents collapse, ensuring a consistent milk flow. Easy to sterilize and durable for repeated use, the **Pigeon Silicon Nipple Meduim** is the ideal choice for healthy and happy growth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon Silicon Nipple Meduim**
â­ Sterilize the nipple thoroughly before each use for hygiene and safety.
â­ Ensure the nipple is securely attached to the bottle to prevent leaks.
â­ Replace the nipple if any signs of damage or wear appear.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon Silicon Nipple Meduim**
â­ High-quality medical-grade silicone.
â­ Food-grade, BPA-free material.
â­ Flexible and soft design for infant comfort.
â­ Provides a medium flow of milk.

Make your baby's bath time an easy and enjoyable experience with the **Pigeon Baby Bath Mitten**. Specially designed to allow you to bathe your baby with one hand, providing you with greater control and extra comfort. The cover is made from hypo-allergenic materials that are extremely gentle on your baby's delicate skin, ensuring maximum safety and softness. The **Pigeon Baby Bath Mitten** features a universal size that fits parents' hands perfectly and comes with an attached string for easy drying and storage.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon Baby Bath Mitten**
â­ Use the **Pigeon Baby Bath Mitten** to gently lather and clean your baby's body during bath time.
â­ Hang to dry after use with the attached string.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon Baby Bath Mitten**
â­ Gentle, hypoallergenic materials.
â­ Ergonomic design for one-handed use.
â­ Integrated drying string.

description_en:
Ensure a perfect dental cleaning experience for your little ones with **Pigeon ToothGel For Babies & Kids Grapes 45 Gm**. This unique gel is fluoride-free, sodium lauryl sulfate-free, and color-free, making it completely safe even if swallowed. Its non-foaming formula helps prevent tooth decay and promotes gum health, with a limited foaming agent for effective cleaning. The delightful grape flavor will make brushing time enjoyable for your children.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon ToothGel For Babies & Kids Grapes 45 Gm**
â­ Apply a small amount of gel to a soft toothbrush.
â­ Gently brush your baby's teeth.
â­ Can be used twice daily.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon ToothGel For Babies & Kids Grapes 45 Gm**
â­ Fluoride-Free.
â­ Sodium Lauryl Sulfate-Free.
â­ Color-Free.
â­ Natural Grape Flavor.
â­ Non-foaming formula.

description_en:
Discover comfort and quality with the **Pigeon Decorated Bottle 240 ml**, specially designed to support your baby's growth.

The **Pigeon Decorated Bottle 240 ml** is an ideal start to your baby's independent eating habits. This bottle allows for natural tongue movement, ensuring maximum development of the baby's facial and jaw muscles. Its unique design incorporates an air ventilation system that allows minimal air intake and smooth milk flow into the baby's stomach. The streamlined shape makes it easy for mothers to hold and clean.

â­ Made from safe and baby-friendly materials.
â­ Streamlined design for easy grip and cleaning.
â­ Encourages natural tongue movement for proper development.
â­ Unique ventilation system reduces air intake.
â­ Flexible silicone nipple for ultra-softness.
â­ Adjustable nipple for increasing or decreasing milk flow.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon Decorated Bottle 240 ml**
â­ Before the first use, sterilize all parts of the bottle.
â­ Ensure the nipple is securely attached.
â­ Adjust the milk flow according to the baby's needs.
â­ Wash the bottle thoroughly after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon Decorated Bottle 240 ml**
â­ Ultra-soft silicone for the nipple.
â­ High-quality, food-grade plastic.

description_en:
Ensure a natural and comfortable feeding experience for your little one with **Pigeon Silicon Nipple Small 3 pcs**. Crafted from high-quality, ultra-soft silicone, these nipples are designed to mimic the feel of natural breastfeeding. Easy to sterilize and reusable, guaranteeing the highest hygiene standards for your baby.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon Silicon Nipple Small 3 pcs**
â­ Sterilize the nipple thoroughly before each use for hygiene and safety.
â­ Ensure the nipple is correctly attached to the feeding bottle.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon Silicon Nipple Small 3 pcs**
â­ Ultra-Soft Silicone: Provides elasticity and a natural feel, similar to a mother's breast.
â­ Unique Shape: Designed to promote correct tongue movement and fit baby's mouth comfortably.
â­ Collapse-Resistant: Maintains its shape during feeding, preventing nipple collapse.
â­ Slow Flow: Ideal for newborns and infants who require a slower feeding rate.

Ensure your little one's ultimate hygiene and protection with **Pigeon Antibacterial Baby Wipes**. These wipes are designed for superior cleanliness, effectively killing over 99.99% of bacteria, making them perfect for sanitizing surfaces and your baby's frequently touched items. Enjoy peace of mind on the go or in situations where soap and water aren't readily available.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon Antibacterial Baby Wipes**:

Introducing the **Pigeon** Teether Trumpet, the perfect companion for your baby's teething journey. Designed to soothe sore gums and provide comfort, this gentle teether stimulates the development of your baby's mouth and fingers. Its ideal shape allows for easy grasping and chewing. Filled with safe, certified sterilized water, the **Pigeon** Teether Trumpet is completely safe for your little one. Provide your baby with relief and peace of mind with **Pigeon**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon**:

â­ Clean the teether thoroughly with warm water and mild soap before each use.
â­ Ensure the teether is intact before offering it to your baby.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon**:
â­ High-quality, BPA-free safe material.

description_en:
Experience a seamless feeding journey with the **Pigeon SofTouch Wide Neck Nipple (LL) - Fast Flow**. This innovative nipple is expertly designed to maximize your baby's comfort and mimic the natural breastfeeding experience.

â­ Perfectly shaped and sized nipple to fit your baby's mouth, ensuring an easy latch.
â­ Vertical inner lines strengthen the nipple structure, preventing it from collapsing during feeding.
â­ Unique textured surface allows the baby to grip the nipple easily and securely, promoting a better feeding experience.
â­ Made from 100% ultra-soft and flexible silicone, allowing for natural and easy tongue movement.
â­ Advanced Air Ventilation System (AVSâ„¢) reduces air intake, which is a potential cause of colic in infants.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon SofTouch Wide Neck Nipple (LL) - Fast Flow**:
â­ Ensure the nipple is thoroughly cleaned and sterilized before first use and after each subsequent use.
â­ Securely attach the nipple to the bottle neck.
â­ Test the milk flow by inverting the bottle to ensure it's suitable for your baby.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon SofTouch Wide Neck Nipple (LL) - Fast Flow**:
â­ 100% premium ultra-soft medical-grade silicone.

#Pigeon #BabyNipple #NaturalFeeding #BabyNutrition #BabyProducts #BabyHealth #BabyCare #Newborns #MedicalSilicone #BreastAndBottleFeeding

description_en:
Indulge your little one in a delightful bath time experience with the **Pigeon Baby Bath Sponge**. Expertly designed for maximum comfort and gentleness on your baby's delicate skin.

â­ Creates rich, dense foam easily with just one hand, making bath time more enjoyable and efficient.
â­ Perfectly contoured to fit a baby's small body, ensuring a thorough yet gentle clean.
â­ Crafted from premium, hypo-allergenic materials, ensuring no irritation to your baby's sensitive skin.
â­ A safe and enjoyable bathing experience for both parent and child.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon Baby Bath Sponge**:
â­ Wet the sponge with warm water.
â­ Add a small amount of baby wash.
â­ Gently squeeze to create a rich lather.
â­ Use to gently massage and cleanse your baby's body.
â­ Rinse the sponge thoroughly after each use and allow it to air dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon Baby Bath Sponge**:
â­ Soft and highly absorbent materials.
â­ Hypo-allergenic components.
â­ Free from harmful chemicals.

description_en:
Experience a superior feeding journey with the **Pigeon Soft Anti-Colic Plastic Bottle 240ml**. Expertly designed to offer maximum comfort and minimize colic for your little one, this bottle mimics the natural feeding motion learned from breastfeeding.

â­ Allows baby to use natural feeding motion learned at the breast.
â­ SofTouchâ„¢ Peristaltic PLUS Nipple is 100% silicone, super soft and flexible to allow for natural and smooth tongue movement.
â­ Air Ventilation System (AVSâ„¢) reduces intake of gas, a potential cause of colic.
â­ Bottle shape is easy to hold.
â­ Specially designed roll-free bottle hoods.
â­ BPA Free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon Soft Anti-Colic Plastic Bottle 240ml**

â­ Sterilize all bottle parts before first use and after each use.
â­ Follow formula preparation instructions when using infant formula.
â­ Always check milk temperature before feeding your baby.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon Soft Anti-Colic Plastic Bottle 240ml**

â­ Durable and lightweight Polypropylene (PP) material.
â­ High-quality medical-grade silicone for the nipple.
â­ Free from harmful substances like BPA.

description_en:
Experience natural and smooth feeding with the **Pigeon SofTouch** Glass Bottle 160 ml for Colic. Specially designed to mimic the natural feeding motion your baby learns from the breast, ensuring maximum comfort. The innovative SofTouchâ„¢ Peristaltic PLUS Nipple is made from 100% silicone, ultra-soft and flexible, allowing for natural and smooth tongue movement. The Air Ventilation System (AVSâ„¢) effectively reduces air intake, a primary cause of colic issues, providing your baby with a calm feeding experience. The glass bottle is easy to hold, crafted from premium borosilicate glass for excellent transparency and high heat resistance. Completely safe and BPA-Free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon SofTouch** Glass Bottle 160 ml for Colic:
â­ Clean and sterilize the bottle and nipple thoroughly before each use.
â­ Follow appropriate milk preparation instructions for your baby's age.
â­ Check the milk temperature before feeding.
â­ Inspect the nipple for any signs of damage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon SofTouch** Glass Bottle 160 ml for Colic:
â­ SofTouchâ„¢ Peristaltic PLUS Nipple made from 100% natural silicone.

â­ AVSâ„¢ (Air Ventilation System).
â­ BPA-Free.

description_en:
Experience the ultimate in comfort with the **Pigeon SofTouch Nipple (LL) 2 pcs (Wide Neck)**. This uniquely designed nipple aims to replicate the natural breastfeeding experience, providing your baby with a comfortable and natural sucking pattern. Its vertical inner lines strengthen the nipple's structure for enhanced durability, while the textured surface ensures an easy and secure grip for your baby. Made from 100% ultra-soft and flexible silicone, the **Pigeon SofTouch Nipple (LL) 2 pcs (Wide Neck)** allows for natural and easy tongue movement. The Air Ventilation System (AVSâ„¢) helps reduce air intake, a potential cause of colic.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon SofTouch Nipple (LL) 2 pcs (Wide Neck)**:
â­ Ensure the nipple is compatible with your bottle neck.
â­ Sterilize the nipple before first use and after each subsequent use.
â­ Inspect the nipple for any signs of damage or wear and replace if necessary.
â­ Use with Pigeon Wide Neck bottles.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon SofTouch Nipple (LL) 2 pcs (Wide Neck)**:
â­ 100% Ultra-soft Silicone
â­ BPA-Free Materials
â­ AVSâ„¢ Compatible Design

description_en:
Experience natural feeding with the **Pigeon Soft Touch Anti-Colic Glass Bottle 160ml**. This bottle allows your baby to use the natural feeding motion learned at the breast. The SofTouchâ„¢ Peristaltic PLUS Nipple is 100% silicone, super soft and flexible to allow for natural and smooth tongue movement. The Air Ventilation System (AVSâ„¢) reduces gas intake, a potential cause of colic, ensuring your baby's comfort.

â­ The bottle shape is easy to hold, making it convenient for little hands.
â­ Made from premium borosilicate glass material with excellent transparency and high heat resistance.
â­ BPA Free, ensuring the safety of your little one.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon Soft Touch Anti-Colic Glass Bottle 160ml**
â­ Before first use, wash all parts in warm, soapy water and rinse thoroughly.
â­ Ensure the nipple and hood are securely attached before each use.
â­ Fill the bottle with your baby's preferred milk or formula.
â­ Test the temperature of the milk before feeding your baby.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon Soft Touch Anti-Colic Glass Bottle 160ml**
â­ High-quality borosilicate glass bottle.
â­ 100% silicone SofTouchâ„¢ Peristaltic PLUS Nipple.
â­ Protective hood and anti-colic cap.
â­ Air Ventilation System (AVSâ„¢).

description_en:
Experience the natural feeding experience with **Pigeon SofTouch** Nipple (L). Crafted from 100% ultra-flexible silicone, this teat is engineered to support your baby's natural tongue movement, mimicking the sucking pattern learned at the breast for a seamless transition between breastfeeding and bottle-feeding.

â­ Made from 100% ultra-flexible silicone.
â­ Mimics natural tongue movement to prevent nipple confusion.
â­ Advanced venting system reduces air intake, minimizing colic and gas.
â­ Easy-grip design for little hands.
â­ Seamless teat covers for ease of use and cleaning.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon SofTouch**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before handling the nipple.
â­ Sterilize the nipple before first use and regularly thereafter as per attached instructions.
â­ Ensure the nipple is correctly fitted onto the bottle collar.
â­ Inspect the nipple regularly for any signs of wear and tear and replace if necessary.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon SofTouch**:
â­ 100% medical-grade silicone.
â­ BPA-free.
â­ Designed for fast flow to suit older babies.

description_en:
Experience natural feeding comfort with **Pigeon SofTouch Nipple (M)**. These nipples are designed to replicate the baby's natural sucking rhythm learned at the breast, ensuring a smooth transition between breastfeeding and bottle-feeding. The ideal shape and size of the nipple cater to the baby's latch, while the inner vertical lines strengthen the nipple's structure against collapse. The textured surface allows for an easy and secure grip, and the 100% ultra-soft and flexible silicone material promotes natural tongue movement. The innovative Air Ventilation System (AVSâ„¢) reduces air intake, a common cause of infant colic.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon SofTouch Nipple (M)**:
â­ Ensure the nipple is correctly and securely attached to the bottle neck.
â­ Regularly inspect the nipple for any signs of damage or wear.
â­ Sterilize the nipple before each use to ensure hygiene.
â­ Choose the appropriate flow rate for your baby's age and development.
â­ Observe your baby's feeding cues to ensure comfort and satisfaction.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon SofTouch Nipple (M)**:
â­ 100% ultra-soft and flexible silicone.
â­ Anatomical design to simulate the natural nipple.
â­ Air Ventilation System (AVSâ„¢) to reduce gas and colic.
â­ BPA-free for your baby's safety.
â­ Textured surface for easy gripping.

#Pigeon #BabyNipple #NaturalFeeding #BabyCare #BabyEssentials #SaudiMoms #JeddahBabies #BabyMilk #BabyBottle #SofTouchNipple

description_en:
Experience discreet and comfortable breast milk expression anywhere with the **Pigeon Manual Breast Pump**. Specifically designed for nursing mothers, it helps you express breast milk effectively and encourage a natural, gentle let-down.

â­ Comfortable and easy-to-use design for expression on the go.
â­ Air-flow system provides gentle suction to encourage natural milk let-down.
â­ Lightweight and portable for convenience.
â­ Easy to clean for maximum hygiene.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon Manual Breast Pump**
â­ Ensure the pump is positioned correctly on the breast.
â­ Squeeze the pump to begin suction.
â­ Press the suction release button to release built-up pressure as directed.
â­ For single use only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon Manual Breast Pump**
â­ High-quality, safe, and hygienic materials.
â­ Innovative design for maximum effectiveness.

description_en:
Discover the soothing benefits of the **Pigeon Cooling Teether (Carrot)**, expertly designed to comfort your baby during teething. This delightful teether stimulates the development of your baby's mouth and fingers, featuring an ideal carrot shape that's easy for little hands to grasp and chew. It's filled with safe, certified sterilized water, ensuring complete peace of mind for your little one.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon Cooling Teether (Carrot)**

â­ Wash the teether thoroughly with soap and water before first use.
â­ For extra soothing relief, chill in the refrigerator (not the freezer).
â­ Always ensure your hands are clean before giving the teether to your baby.
â­ Inspect the teether regularly for any signs of damage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon Cooling Teether (Carrot)**

â­ High-quality silicone material, safe and gentle on baby's gums.
â­ Sterilized and tested water for complete safety.
â­ Carrot-shaped design, stimulates mouth and finger development.
â­ BPA-free and free from harmful substances.

description_en:
Soothe your baby's teething discomfort with the **Pigeon Watery Teether** in a delightful strawberry red. Designed for babies 4 months and older, this teether offers effective relief.

â­ Provides effective relief for teething gums.
â­ Safe and gentle material for baby's sensitive gums.
â­ Cute strawberry shape in red to attract baby's attention.
â­ Can be refrigerated for cooling comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon Watery Teether**:
â­ Wash thoroughly with mild soap and water before first use.
â­ Can be placed in the refrigerator (not freezer) for a short period to cool.
â­ Offer to your baby when they show signs of teething.
â­ Always supervise your child during use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon Watery Teether**:
â­ Food-grade silicone, BPA-free.
â­ Non-toxic cooling gel.
â­ Durable plastic construction, free from harmful substances.

description_en:
Soothe your little one through teething with the **Pigeon Teether Piano P369**. Specially designed to alleviate uncomfortable gum pain and stimulate the development of your baby's mouth and fingers. Its unique and ergonomic shape allows your baby to easily grasp and chew, providing a calming and enjoyable experience.

â­ Stimulates the development of baby's mouth and fingers.
â­ Ideal shape for baby to chew and grasp.
â­ Filled with safe, certified sterilized water for ultimate peace of mind.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pigeon Teether Piano P369**:
â­ Before first use, wash the teether with soap and water or use a baby-safe sterilizer.
â­ Can be chilled in the refrigerator (not freezer) for enhanced soothing effect.
â­ Replace the teether if any signs of wear or damage appear.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pigeon Teether Piano P369**:
â­ Made from BPA-free, safe materials.
â­ Filled with pure, sterilized water.
â­ Soft, bite-resistant outer surface.

Experience the ultimate in freshness and purity with **Pears** Gentle Soap. This exquisite bar, enriched with 99% natural oils and pure glycerin, is expertly formulated to provide your skin with superior care. Dermatologically tested, it deeply cleanses and purifies your skin from external impurities while maintaining its natural moisture for all-day hydration. Its paraben-free formula makes it the perfect choice for your skin, especially during summer, leaving it soft, fresh, and youthful. **Pears** rejuvenates skin cells, promoting a hydrated and revitalized complexion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pears** Gentle Soap:
â­ Wet your loofah with warm water.

â­ Enjoy a long-lasting refreshing scent.

description_en:
Experience unparalleled softness and freshness with **Pears Soft & Fresh Mint Bar Soap**, specially formulated to provide your skin with superior care. Enriched with refreshing mint extracts and 98% pure glycerin, this soap leaves your skin soft, moisturized, and youthful all day long. Dermatologically tested and paraben-free, it ensures a safe and effective experience.

â­ Deeply cleanses and purifies the skin, removing impurities. 
â­ Provides long-lasting superior softness. 
â­ Helps moisturize the skin and maintain its natural hydration. 
â­ Rejuvenates skin cells and enhances radiance. 
â­ Suitable for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pears Soft & Fresh Mint Bar Soap**:
â­ Wet a loofah with warm water.
â­ Rub the soap with the loofah to create a rich lather.
â­ Gently wash your body with the lather.
â­ Rinse your skin thoroughly with water.
â­ Enjoy the freshness and pleasant scent.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pears Soft & Fresh Mint Bar Soap**:
â­ Pure Glycerin (98%).
â­ Mint Extracts.

#PearsSoap #SkinCare #SoftSkin #Freshness #Moisturizing #NaturalSoap #BeautyProducts #SaudiBeauty #DubaiSkincare #KSA

description_en:
Experience the secret to radiant skin with **Pears Natural Pomegranate Soap Bar**. This new bathing bar is infused with the goodness of nature, featuring a gentle, 0% Paraben formulation, specially designed for your daily skincare routine. Enriched with pure glycerin, the **Pears Natural Pomegranate Soap Bar** helps retain your skin's natural moisture, leaving it feeling exceptionally soft and smooth with a lasting natural glow. Combining the power of 100% natural Pomegranate and nourishing ingredients, this soap works to rejuvenate skin cells, remove impurities, and give you unparalleled brightness and vitality. It's suitable for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pears Natural Pomegranate Soap Bar**:
â­ Suitable for daily use on face, body, and hands as needed.
â­ Wet a loofah with warm water.
â­ Rub the soap with the loofah until a rich, soft lather is formed.
â­ Wash your body thoroughly with the lather.
â­ Rinse your body with warm water and enjoy the freshness and delightful fragrance.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pears Natural Pomegranate Soap Bar**:
â­ 100% Natural Pomegranate Extract.
â­ Pure Glycerin for deep moisturization.
â­ Gentle, natural ingredients for skin.
â­ 0% Parabens.

Experience ultimate freshness and rejuvenation with the **Pears Soap Bar Natural Aloe Vera**, expertly crafted for your skin. This luxurious soap bar combines 100% natural goodness with purifying aloe vera for superior care. Enjoy soft, moisturized, and glowing skin all day long. Its gentle, paraben-free formulation is enriched with pure glycerin to preserve your skin's natural moisture.

**Product Features:**
â­ Provides all-day comprehensive care for your skin.
â­ Deeply cleanses and purifies the skin, removing dirt and impurities from external exposure.
â­ Leaves skin feeling soft and smooth for extended periods.
â­ Rejuvenates skin cells and promotes vitality and freshness.
â­ Deeply moisturizes the skin, giving it a healthy appearance.
â­ Suitable for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pears Soap Bar Natural Aloe Vera**
â­ Suitable for daily use on the face, body, and hands.
â­ Wet your loofah or skin with warm water.
â­ Rub the soap to create a rich lather.
â­ Gently massage the lather onto the skin.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with warm water.
â­ Enjoy the refreshing scent that leaves your skin fragrantly clean.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pears Soap Bar Natural Aloe Vera**
â­ 100% Natural Aloe Vera Extract
â­ Pure Glycerin to maintain skin moisture
â­ Gentle, skin-friendly natural ingredients
â­ Paraben-Free Formula

Experience pure refreshment with **Pears Natural Soap with Aloe Vera** 125gm. Enriched with olive oil and antioxidants, it works to protect your skin from toxins and provide deep hydration. Aloe Vera, known for its purifying properties, leaves your skin incredibly soft, radiant, and revitalized.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pears Natural Soap with Aloe Vera**:
â­ Wet the soap bar with water to create a rich lather.
â­ Gently massage the lather onto your body and hands in circular motions.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water to remove any residue.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pears Natural Soap with Aloe Vera**:
â­ Water
â­ Glycerin
â­ Sorbitol
â­ Sodium Laurate
â­ Coumarin
â­ Limonene
â­ Natural Aloe Vera Extract

description_en:
**Beesline Roll On Deo Fragrance Free, 50 ml**: An innovative, skin-friendly formula that absorbs moisture, prevents odor, and moisturizes sensitive underarms. Perfect for sensitive skin and for Hajj and Umrah pilgrims during Ihram. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Roll On Deo Fragrance Free, 50 ml**:
â­ Apply a thin layer to clean, dry underarms.
â­ Allow to dry completely before dressing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Roll On Deo Fragrance Free, 50 ml**:
â­ Aqua, Vegetable Glycerin, Mel (Honey), Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Extract, Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract, Potassium Alum, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetyl Alcohol, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Extract.
â­ Carbomer, Ceteareth-12, Ceteareth-20, Polysorbate 80, Lactic Acid, Sodium Lactate, Propolis, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Propanediol (Teflose), Rhamnose (Teflose), Glucose (Teflose), Glucuronic Acid (Teflose).

description_en:
Experience ultimate freshness and softness with **Beesline Roll-On Deodorant Whitening Cotton Candy**. This innovative Beesline formula offers superior 48-hour protection against sweat and odor, featuring a safe and effective blend that lightens and evens your underarm skin tone for a brighter, more radiant look. It soothes the skin, leaving you feeling confident and refreshed all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Roll-On Deodorant Whitening Cotton Candy**:
â­ Use daily.
â­ Apply a thin layer to clean, dry underarms.
â­ Allow to dry before dressing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Roll-On Deodorant Whitening Cotton Candy**:
â­ Aqua.
â­ Potassium Alum (Alum Rock).
â­ Glyceryl Stearate.
â­ Cetyl Alcohol.
â­ Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride & Diacetyl-boldine (Lumiskin).
â­ Propanediol & Aqua & Rhamnose & Glucose & Glucuronic Acid (Teï¬‚ose).
â­ Lactic Acid.
â­ Triticum Vulgare Germ Oil (Wheat) Germ Oil.
â­ Sodium Lactate.
â­ Ceteareth 12.
â­ Ceteareth 20.
â­ Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Extract.
â­ PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil.
â­ Carum Petroselinum Extract (Parsley) Extract.
â­ Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract.
â­ Cera Propolis (Propolis).
â­ Parfum.
â­ Potassium Sorbate.
â­ Sodium Benzoate.

description_en:
Experience long-lasting freshness with the **Beesline Deo Roll On Fragrance-Free Offer (1+1 Free)**. Specially formulated for your sensitive skin, this duo offer provides effective protection against sweat and odor without any artificial fragrance.

â­ Protects against sweat and odor for up to 48 hours.
â­ Gentle formula, suitable for sensitive skin.
â­ Gives you a feeling of freshness and confidence all day long.
â­ Prevents stains on clothing.
â­ Keeps underarms dry and comfortable.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Deo Roll On Fragrance-Free Offer (1+1 Free)**
â­ Use daily on clean, dry underarms.
â­ Apply a thin layer to the underarm area.
â­ Allow to dry completely before dressing.
â­ Reapply after heavy physical activity or bathing to ensure continuous freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Deo Roll On Fragrance-Free Offer (1+1 Free)**
â­ Alum Rock
â­ Lumiskin
â­ Teflose
â­ Lactic Acid
â­ Wheatgerm Oil
â­ Sodium Lactate
â­ Aloe Vera
â­ Olive Leaf
â­ Parsley
â­ Propolis

description_en:
Discover **Beesline Whitening Sensitive Zone Soap**, the ultimate natural solution for smooth and radiant skin. This soothing soap gently disinfects and cleanses the skin of irritating bacteria, eliminating odor and discomfort thanks to its pH regulating properties. It effectively lightens, moisturizes, and revitalizes darkened intimate areas, helping you regain your confidence.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Whitening Sensitive Zone Soap**
â­ Use as needed.
â­ Lather soap with lukewarm water.
â­ Gently massage into bikini line, inner thighs & intimates.
â­ Rinse well with water and pat dry.
â­ Follow with Beesline Whitening Sensitive Zone Cream for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Whitening Sensitive Zone Soap**
â­ Vegetable Glycerin.
â­ Sodium Olivate.
â­ Sodium Cocoate.
â­ PEG-7 Oleate.
â­ Sorbitol.
â­ Saccharum Officinarum (Sugar Cane) Extract.
â­ Aqua.
â­ Sodium Lactate.
â­ Cera Propolis (Propolis).
â­ Lactic Acid.
â­ Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Extract.
â­ Avena Sativa (Oat) Extract.
â­ Maris Sal (Sea Salt).
â­ Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract.
â­ Olea Europaea (Olive) Oil.
â­ Parfum.
â­ Panthenol (Provitamin B5).
â­ PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil.
â­ Carum Petroselinum (Parsley) Extract.
â­ EDTA.

title_ar: Ù…Ø¬Ù…ÙˆØ¹Ø© Ø¨ÙŠØ²Ù„ÙŠÙ† Ù„Ù„Ø­Ø¬: Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙŠØ© Ø§Ù„Ù…ØªÙƒØ§Ù…Ù„Ø© Ù„Ù„Ø­Ø¬Ø§Ø¬
description_en:
Discover comfort and freshness with the **Beesline Hajj Kit**, the ideal personal care solution for your spiritual journey. This natural, fragrance-free kit is specially formulated to meet your essential needs, ensuring you feel clean and serene throughout your pilgrimage.

â­ Inside, you'll find a Beeswax Ointment (20ml) for skin hydration, a Honey Moisturizing Soap (60g) for gentle cleansing, and a Daily Use Shampoo (100ml) to refresh hair and body. It also includes a complimentary rosary to accompany your prayers.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Hajj Kit**:
â­ Lather the soap with water and gently massage the foam onto your face, hands, or body. Rinse well and pat dry.
â­ Apply shampoo to wet hair or body, lather, and rinse well.
â­ Apply the ointment to dry, chapped, or irritated skin on lips, face, hands, and body.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Hajj Kit**:
â­ Beeswax Ointment: Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Cera Alba (Beeswax), Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Oil, Glyceryl Stearate, Polysorbate 80, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Oil, Nigella Sativa Seed Oil.
â­ Honey Moisturizing Soap: Vegetable Glycerin, Sodium Cocoate, Sodium Stearate, PEG-7 Oleate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sorbitol, Aqua, Maris Sal (Sea Salt), Mel (Honey), Cera Propolis (Propolis), EDTA, Yellow CI19140.
â­ Daily Use Shampoo: Aqua, Decyl Glucoside, Sodium PEG-7 Olive Oil Carboxylate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Extract, Hydroxypropyl Guar, Panthenol (Provitamin B5), PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Cera Propolis, Mel (Honey), Maris Sal (Sea Salt), Vegetable Glycerin, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, EDTA, Yellow CI 19140.

#Beesline #HajjKit #PilgrimCare #NaturalProducts #FragranceFree #SaudiArabia #Mecca #Medina #HajjMubarak #Skincare

description_en:
Experience freshness and purity with **Beesline Rollon Deo Whitening Cotton Candy 50 Ml (1+1)**. This innovative, safe, and highly effective antiperspirant deodorant provides 48-hour protection against body odor, works to absorb moisture, and soothe sensitive skin. Additionally, it helps to lighten and even out skin tone, leaving your underarms noticeably clean and bright.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Rollon Deo Whitening Cotton Candy 50 Ml (1+1)**:
â­ Use daily.
â­ Apply a thin layer to clean, dry underarms.
â­ Allow to dry completely before dressing.
â­ For external use only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Rollon Deo Whitening Cotton Candy 50 Ml (1+1)**:
â­ Aqua.
â­ Potassium Alum (Alum Rock).
â­ Glyceryl Stearate.
â­ Cetyl Alcohol.
â­ Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride & Diacetyl-boldine (Lumiskin).
â­ Propanediol & Aqua & Rhamnose & Glucose & Glucuronic Acid (Teï¬‚ose).
â­ Lactic Acid.
â­ Triticum Vulgare Germ Oil (Wheat) Germ Oil.
â­ Sodium Lactate.
â­ Ceteareth 12.
â­ Ceteareth 20.
â­ Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Extract.
â­ PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil.
â­ Carum Petroselinum Extract (Parsley) Extract.
â­ Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract.
â­ Parfum.
â­ Potassium Sorbate.
â­ Sodium Benzoate.

description_en:
Reveal your brightest complexion with **Beesline Soap Facial Whitening**, a moisturizing bar infused with honey and radiance-boosting botanical extracts. It deeply cleanses and refreshes your skin, working to visibly brighten and even out your skin tone for a naturally luminous look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Soap Facial Whitening**:
â­ Use twice daily for optimal results.
â­ Lather the soap with water to create a rich foam.
â­ Gently massage the foam onto your skin.
â­ Rinse your skin thoroughly with water and pat dry gently.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Soap Facial Whitening**:
â­ Vegetable Glycerin for essential moisture.
â­ Honey to nourish and enhance skin radiance.
â­ Olive Leaf Extract for brightening and evening skin tone.
â­ Lumiskin for improved skin luminosity.
â­ Lemon Peel Extract for added brightening effects.
â­ Parsley Leaf Extract for antioxidant benefits.

description_en:
Experience unparalleled protection with **Beesline Ultrascreen Cream Invisible Sunfilter SPF 50**, specifically formulated to shield your delicate skin from harmful UV rays and premature aging. Its advanced, non-greasy formula leaves no white cast, making it your perfect choice for daily wear and under makeup.

â­ Effectively protects skin from damaging UV rays.
â­ Prevents the appearance of premature aging.
â­ Suitable for sensitive skin, face, neck, and dÃ©colletage.
â­ Non-greasy formula with no white cast.
â­ Ideal for use before makeup application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Ultrascreen Cream Invisible Sunfilter SPF 50**:
â­ Apply generously to face and body 15 minutes before sun exposure.
â­ Reapply every 2 hours, especially after swimming, sweating, or towel-drying.

description_en:
Experience a new level of freshness and brightness with **Beesline Whitening & Hair Delay Deo Roll On 50ml**. This innovative, safe, and highly effective antiperspirant deodorant provides 48-hour protection against sweat and body odor. It works simultaneously to lighten dark underarm skin and delay the re-appearance of unwanted hair, leaving your underarms clean, bright, and smooth. Choose **Beesline Whitening & Hair Delay Deo Roll On 50ml** for your daily care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Whitening & Hair Delay Deo Roll On 50ml**
â­ Apply daily to clean, dry underarms.
â­ Apply a thin layer.
â­ Allow to dry completely before dressing for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Whitening & Hair Delay Deo Roll On 50ml**
â­ Aqua, Potassium Alum, Glyceryl Monostearate, Cetyl Alcohol.
â­ Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride & Diacetyl-Boldine (Lumiskin), Propanediol & Aqua & Rhamnose & Glucose & Glucuronic Acid (Teï¬‚ose).
â­ Lactic Acid, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Oil, Sodium Lactate.
â­ Ceteareth 12, Ceteareth 20, Zingiber Ofï¬cinale (Ginger) Root Extract, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe vera) Extract.
â­ Glycine Soja (Soybean) Extract, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Carum Petroselinum (Parsley) Extract.
â­ Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract, Cera Propolis, Parfum, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate.

#Beesline #Deodorant #UnderarmCare #SkinWhitening #BodyCare #SaudiBeauty #Freshness #NaturalIngredients #BeautyTips #PersonalCare

Its unique formula not only absorbs moisture and soothes skin, but also works to lighten and even out skin tone, leaving you with brighter, fresher underarms. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Whitening Deo Roll-On Pacific Islands**:
â­ Use daily on clean, dry underarms.

â­ Allow to dry completely before dressing to avoid any marks.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Whitening Deo Roll-On Pacific Islands**:
â­ Aqua, Potassium Alum (Alum Rock), Glyceryl Stearate, Cetyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride & Diacetyl-boldine (Lumiskin), Propanediol & Aqua & Rhamnose & Glucose & Glucuronic Acid (Teï¬‚ose), Lactic Acid, Triticum Vulgare Germ Oil (Wheat) Germ Oil, Sodium Lactate, Ceteareth 12, Ceteareth 20, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Extract, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Carum Petroselinum Extract (Parsley) Extract, Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract, Cera Propolis (Propolis), Parfum, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate.

Reveal brighter, softer skin with **Beesline Soap Facial Exfoliating 60 gm**. This moisturising vegetal soap, infused with exfoliating luffa, deeply cleanses and buffs away dead cells and impurities, revealing revitalised and radiant skin. It works to reduce UV damage and boost skin freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Soap Facial Exfoliating 60 gm**
â­ Use 2-3 times per week.
â­ Lather the soap with warm water.
â­ Gently massage the luffa onto your face in circular motions.
â­ Rinse off thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Soap Facial Exfoliating 60 gm**
â­ Vegetable Glycerin
â­ Sodium Stearate
â­ Sodium Olivate
â­ PEG-7 Oleate
â­ Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate
â­ Sorbitol
â­ Saccharum Officinarum (Sugar Cane) Extract
â­ Aqua
â­ Sodium Lactate
â­ Luffa Cylindrica (Loofah)
â­ Maris Sal (Sea Salt)
â­ Parfum
â­ PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil
â­ Carum Petroselinum (Parsley) Leaf Extract
â­ Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract
â­ Olea Europaea (Olive) Oil
â­ EDTA

description_en:
Experience pure and refreshing skin with **Beesline Fragrance-Free Honey Soap**.

This soap, enriched with natural honey extract and completely free of fragrances, is the perfect choice for ultra-gentle skin cleansing. It deeply purifies and moisturizes the skin, leaving you with a long-lasting refreshed feeling. Its mild formula makes it especially suitable for sensitive skin, ensuring a comfortable and irritation-free daily care experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Fragrance-Free Honey Soap**:
â­ This soap can be used daily for face and body cleansing.
â­ Moisten your skin, then gently lather the soap onto wet skin.
â­ Rinse off thoroughly with warm water.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes.
â­ For external use only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Fragrance-Free Honey Soap**:
â­ Vegetable Glycerin.
â­ Sodium Cocoate.
â­ Sodium Stearate.
â­ PEG-7 Oleate.
â­ Cocoamidopropyl Betaine.
â­ Sorbitol.
â­ Aqua.
â­ Maris Sal (Sea Salt).
â­ Mel (Honey).
â­ Propolis.
â­ EDTA.
â­ Yellow CI 19140.

description_en:
Experience lasting freshness and gentle care with **Beesline Deo Roll On Whitening Green Forest**. This innovative, safe, and highly effective 48-hour antiperspirant deodorant combats body odor, absorbs moisture, and soothes the skin. **Beesline Deo Roll On Whitening Green Forest** is specially formulated to lighten and even out skin tone, leaving your underarms feeling clean, bright, and smooth. Enjoy confidence and comfort all day long with this powerful yet gentle underarm solution.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Deo Roll On Whitening Green Forest**:
â­ Apply a thin layer daily to clean, dry underarms.
â­ Allow the product to dry completely before dressing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Deo Roll On Whitening Green Forest**:
â­ Aqua.
â­ Potassium Alum (Alum Rock).
â­ Glyceryl Stearate.
â­ Cetyl Alcohol.
â­ Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride & Diacetyl-boldine (Lumiskin).
â­ Propanediol & Aqua & Rhamnose & Glucose & Glucuronic Acid (Teï¬‚ose).
â­ Lactic Acid.
â­ Triticum Vulgare Germ Oil (Wheat) Germ Oil.
â­ Sodium Lactate.
â­ Ceteareth 12.
â­ Ceteareth 20.
â­ Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Extract.
â­ PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil.
â­ Carum Petroselinum Extract (Parsley) Extract.
â­ Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract.
â­ Cera Propolis (Propolis).
â­ Parfum.
â­ Potassium Sorbate.
â­ Sodium Benzoate.

description_en:
Experience ultimate dryness and lasting freshness with **Beesline Roll On Super Dry Fragrance Free**. Enjoy effective 72-hour protection with an innovative and safe formula that brightens and evens skin tone. This roll-on combats body odor, absorbs sweat, and soothes sensitive skin, giving you complete confidence and comfort all day long. It's the perfect choice for gentle yet powerful underarm care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Roll On Super Dry Fragrance Free**
â­ Use daily on clean, dry underarms.
â­ Apply a thin layer for maximum protection.
â­ Allow to dry completely before dressing.
â­ Reapply after physical activity or bathing to maintain freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Roll On Super Dry Fragrance Free**
â­ Aqua.
â­ Potassium Alum.
â­ Sodium Lactate.
â­ Glycerin.
â­ Xanthan Gum.
â­ Lactic Acid.
â­ Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate.
â­ Niacinamide.
â­ PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil.
â­ Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract.
â­ Olea Europaea Leaf Extract.
â­ Carum Petroselinum Herb Extract.
â­ Phenoxyethanol.
â­ Propolis Cera.
â­ EDTA.

description_en:
Experience ultimate freshness and dryness with **Beesline Roll On Deodorant**. This advanced formula provides 72-hour protection against odor and sweat, leaving your underarms feeling incredibly soft and dry, like powder. It also works to soothe, lighten, and even out skin tone for a smoother, more radiant appearance. Enjoy confidence that lasts all day!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Roll On Deodorant**:
â­ Apply daily to clean, dry underarms.
â­ Allow a thin layer to dry completely before dressing.
â­ Reapply after strenuous activity or bathing for continuous freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Roll On Deodorant**:
â­ Aqua, Potassium Alum, Sodium Lactate, Glycerin, Xanthan Gum, Lactic Acid.
â­ Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Niacinamide, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil.
â­ Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Olea Europaea Leaf Extract, Carum Petroselinum Herb Extract.
â­ Parfum, Phenoxyethanol, Propolis Cera, EDTA.

Experience ultimate freshness and long-lasting protection with **Beesline Roll On**.

Enjoy the benefits of this innovative roll-on deodorant designed to whiten and even out skin tone, offering effective protection against body odour for 24 hours. Its safe, aluminum-free, and fragrance-free formula ensures gentle care for your sensitive skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Roll On**:
â­ Use daily on clean, dry underarms.
â­ Apply a thin layer.
â­ Allow to dry before dressing.
â­ Reapply after heavy physical activity or bathing to maintain freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Roll On**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium Lactate, Glycerin.
â­ Ethylhexylglycerin, Xanthan Gum.
â­ Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Niacinamide.
â­ PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Lactic Acid.
â­ Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Olea Europaea Leaf Extract, Carum Petroselinum Herb Extract.
â­ Phenoxyethanol, Propolis Cera, EDTA.

description_en:
Experience ultimate freshness with **Beesline Deo Roll On Whitening Cool Breeze**. This innovative antiperspirant deodorant offers superior 48-hour protection against sweat and odor. Its safe and effective formula works to lighten and even out underarm skin tone, leaving you with clean, bright, and confidently fresh underarms.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Deo Roll On Whitening Cool Breeze**
â­ Apply daily to clean, dry underarms.
â­ Apply a thin layer.
â­ Allow to dry completely before dressing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Deo Roll On Whitening Cool Breeze**
â­ Aqua
â­ Potassium Alum (Alum Rock)
â­ Glyceryl Stearate
â­ Cetyl Alcohol
â­ Lumiskin (Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride & Diacetyl-boldine)

description_en:
Experience instant brightening and lasting radiance with **Beesline Roll On Instant White with Vitamin C**. This innovative and safe formula provides superior 48-hour protection against sweat and body odor, while gently moisturizing and soothing underarm skin. **Beesline Roll On Instant White with Vitamin C** works to instantly brighten dark underarms and helps even out skin tone with regular use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Roll On Instant White with Vitamin C**:
â­ Use daily on clean, dry underarms.
â­ Apply a thin layer to the underarm area.
â­ Allow to dry completely before dressing.
â­ Can be reapplied after exercise or showering for continuous freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Roll On Instant White with Vitamin C**:
â­ Aqua.
â­ Potassium Alum.
â­ Cyclopentasiloxane.
â­ Cyclohexasiloxane.
â­ Steareth-2.
â­ Steareth-21.
â­ Glycerin.
â­ Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer.
â­ Boron Nitride.
â­ Phenoxyethanol.
â­ Mica.
â­ CI 77891.
â­ Silica.
â­ PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil.
â­ Aloe Barbadensis Extract.
â­ Niacinamide.
â­ Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate.
â­ Sapphire Powder.
â­ Parfum.
â­ EDTA.

description_en:
Discover the secret to bright and clean underarms with **Beesline Deo Roll On Whitening**.

**Beesline Deo Roll On Whitening** is an innovative deodorant offering superior 48-hour protection, fighting body odor, absorbing moisture, and soothing the skin.

**Beesline Deo Roll On Whitening** goes further by effectively lightening the skin and delaying unwanted hair growth, giving you brighter and healthier underarms.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Deo Roll On Whitening**

â­ Use daily.
â­ Apply a thin layer to clean, dry underarms.
â­ Allow to dry completely before dressing.
â­ Reapply after heavy physical activity or bathing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Deo Roll On Whitening**

â­ Aqua.
â­ Potassium Alum (Alum Rock) Powder.
â­ Glyceryl Stearate.
â­ Cetyl Alcohol.
â­ Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride & Diacetyl-Boldine (Lumiskin).
â­ Propanediol & Water & Rhamnose & Glucose & Glucuronic Acid (Teï¬‚ose).
â­ Lactic Acid.

â­ Ceteareth-12.
â­ Ceteareth-20.
â­ Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Extract.

â­ Carum Petroselinum (Parsley Extract).
â­ Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract.
â­ Propolis.
â­ Potassium Sorbate.
â­ Sodium Benzoate.

description_en:
Experience ultimate relief and refreshment with **Beesline After Sun Cooling Lotion** for face and body. Enriched with replenishing aloe vera and invigorating peppermint, it provides instant cooling and relief from burning sensations, while beeswax, royal jelly, and pumpkin extract nourish and repair the skin.

â­ Provides ultimate relief and refreshment after sun exposure
â­ Rich in replenishing aloe vera and invigorating peppermint
â­ Cools and soothes burning sensations
â­ Nourishes and repairs the skin
â­ Suitable for both face and body

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline After Sun Cooling Lotion**:
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Apply generously to the face and body after sun exposure.
â­ Reapply as often as desired to effectively increase the skin's moisture levels.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline After Sun Cooling Lotion**:
â­ Aloe Vera Extract (Aloe Barbadensis Extract): Provides soothing and cooling properties to relieve sunburn and hydrate the skin. It reduces redness and inflammation.
â­ Pumpkin Extract (Cucurbita Pepo Fruit Extract): Contains enzymes and antioxidants that nourish and rejuvenate the skin. It also provides hydration and repairs damaged skin.
â­ Vitamin E (Tocopherol Acetate): A powerful antioxidant that protects the skin from free radical damage. It also has moisturizing properties that keep the skin soft and supple.
â­ Provitamin B5 (Panthenol): A hydrating and soothing ingredient that replenishes moisture in the skin. It aids in repairing the skin's barrier and promoting its healing.
â­ Vitamin C (Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate): An antioxidant that supports collagen production and enhances the skin's natural defense against environmental stressors.
â­ Royal Jelly: A nutrient-rich substance produced by bees. It is known for its moisturizing and nourishing properties, promoting skin repair and rejuvenation.
â­ Peppermint Oil (Mentha Piperita Oil): Provides a cooling and refreshing sensation on the skin, helping to relieve sunburn discomfort.

#Beesline #AfterSunLotion #SkinCare #SkinHydration #HealthySkin #Refreshment #Soothing #SunProtection #BeautyProducts #SaudiArabia
