description_en:
Achieve a deep, alluring tan with **Beesline Sun Tan Oil**. Its unique formula, enriched with fresh carrot extract, beeswax, and precious oils, works to give your skin a safe and long-lasting bronzed color. The oil absorbs quickly to keep your skin moisturized, prevent dryness, and enhance its elasticity for a comfortable and effective tanning experience.

â­ Nutrient-rich formula for a safe and long-lasting tan.
â­ Contains fresh carrot extract, beeswax, and precious oils.
â­ Locks in moisture, prevents skin dehydration, and enhances skin elasticity.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Sun Tan Oil**:
â­ Apply generously to your skin before sun exposure.
â­ Reapply frequently, especially after swimming or towel-drying.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Sun Tan Oil**:
â­ Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil.
â­ Beeswax.
â­ Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Root Extract.
â­ Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil.
â­ Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Oil.
â­ Parfum (Fragrance).
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E).

#Beesline #SunTanOil #NaturalTan #Skincare #BeachLife #SummerVibes #HydratedSkin #RadiantGlow #Beauty #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience long-lasting freshness and dryness with **Beesline Roll On Deodorant Super Dry Jouri Rose**. This innovative formula offers superior 72-hour protection against sweat and odor, while also lightening and evening your underarm skin tone. Say goodbye to body odor and embrace confidence and lasting freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Roll On Deodorant Super Dry Jouri Rose**:
â­ Apply daily to clean, dry underarms.
â­ Apply a thin layer.
â­ Allow to dry before dressing.
â­ Reapply after physical activity or bathing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Roll On Deodorant Super Dry Jouri Rose**:
â­ Aqua.
â­ Potassium Alum.
â­ Sodium Lactate.
â­ Glycerin.
â­ Xanthan Gum.
â­ Lactic Acid.
â­ Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate.
â­ Niacinamide.
â­ PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil.
â­ Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract.
â­ Olea Europaea Leaf Extract.
â­ Carum Petroselinum Herb Extract.
â­ Parfum.
â­ Phenoxyethanol.
â­ Propolis Cera.
â­ EDTA.

description_en:
Achieve radiant and glowing skin with **Beesline Instant Bright Glow Serum**. This ultra-enriched serum instantly boosts skin radiance and glow, leaving skin visibly brighter and plumper from the first use. Infused with hyaluronic acid for deep hydration, it helps keep skin smooth, youthful, and well-moisturized. It also unifies skin tone and targets hyperpigmentation, with proven results within 4 weeks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Instant Bright Glow Serum**

â­ Use 2 times per day (morning & evening).
â­ First, cleanse skin with Beesline Instant Bright 5 in 1 Cleanser.
â­ Follow with Instant Bright Facial Toner.
â­ Then, apply the serum to the face and neck and massage until fully absorbed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Instant Bright Glow Serum**

â­ Caprylic/capric triglyceride.
â­ Glycerin.
â­ Glyceryl stearate se.
â­ Polysorbate 80.
â­ Ceteareth-20.
â­ Ethylhexylglycerin.
â­ Methyl methacrylate crosspolymer.
â­ Boron nitride.
â­ Mica.
â­ Dimethicone.
â­ Allantoin.
â­ Aloe barbadensis leaf extract.
â­ Titanium dioxide.
â­ Xanthan gum.
â­ Tocopheryl acetate.
â­ Polysilicone-11.
â­ Sodium hyaluronate.
â­ Sapphire powder.
â­ Rosa damascena flower oil.
â­ Magnesium ascorbyl phosphate.
â­ Diacetyl boldine.
â­ Citronellol.
â­ Geraniol.

#Beesline #BrighteningSerum #Skincare #Hydration #RadiantSkin #InstantGlow #Beauty #HealthySkin #SaudiArabia #KSA

description_en:
Introducing Beesline Ultra Screen SPF50, an advanced hybrid formula that blends non-nano mineral and organic sun protection for comprehensive defense against UVA, UVB, and IR rays. Enriched with precious oils and beeswax, Beesline Ultra Screen SPF50 works to prevent dehydration, while sesame and henna offer natural sun-filtering. Enjoy an invisible, matte finish that makes this product ideal for wear under makeup, ensuring protected and radiant skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for Beesline Ultra Screen SPF50:
â­ Apply generously to your skin 15 minutes before sun exposure.
â­ Reapply frequently every 2 hours, and directly after swimming or towel-drying.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of Beesline Ultra Screen SPF50:
â­ Aqua (Water).
â­ Octocrylene.
â­ Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate.
â­ Beeswax.
â­ Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil.
â­ Lawsonia Inermis (Henna) Leaf Extract.
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E).
â­ Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Oil.
â­ Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil.

description_en:
Discover the secret to luminous and radiant skin with **Beesline Unifying Brightening Serum 30 ml**. This innovative serum is powered by 15% pure Vitamin C, effectively fading dark spots and unifying skin tone for visibly brighter results in just two weeks. Enjoy revitalized, flawless skin, suitable for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Unifying Brightening Serum 30 ml**:
â­ To be used in the morning and night.
â­ Apply up to 3 pumps to the face and neck.
â­ Spread the serum evenly and massage it until fully absorbed.
â­ Can be layered as step 2, after the Super Hydrating Serum.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Unifying Brightening Serum 30 ml**:
â­ Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate.
â­ 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic acid.
â­ Glycerin.
â­ Caprylic/capric Triglyceride.
â­ Panthenol.
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate.
â­ Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract.

Experience fresh, brighter underarms with **Beesline Deo Roll On Whitening Eler Rose 50 ml**. This innovative and safe formula offers superior 48-hour antiperspirant protection, effectively combating body odor. It gently absorbs moisture, soothes the skin, and works to lighten and even out skin tone for a clean, confident feel all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Deo Roll On Whitening Eler Rose 50 ml**:
â­ Use daily on clean, dry underarms.
â­ Apply a thin layer and allow it to dry before dressing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Deo Roll On Whitening Eler Rose 50 ml**:
â­ Aqua.
â­ Potassium Alum (Alum Rock).
â­ Glyceryl Stearate.

description_en:
Achieve a perfect bronze glow with **Beesline Gold Suntan Oil**. This unique blend of healthy shimmering oils provides deep tanning while protecting and hydrating your skin. Enriched with the goodness of beeswax and gold, it ensures a safe, long-lasting tan while enhancing your skin's radiance and shimmer.

â­ Delivers a deep and luxurious tan.
â­ Enriched with beeswax and gold for hydration and protection.
â­ Provides a safe and long-lasting tan.
â­ Enhances skin radiance and shimmer.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Gold Suntan Oil**:
â­ Apply generously to your skin before sun exposure.
â­ Reapply frequently, especially after swimming or towel-drying.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Gold Suntan Oil**:
â­ Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil.
â­ Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil.
â­ Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Oil.
â­ Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil.
â­ Beeswax.
â­ Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Butter.
â­ Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Oil.
â­ PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil.
â­ Parfum (Fragrance).
â­ Panthenol (Pro-vitamin B5).
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E).
â­ Gold.
â­ [+/- (May Contain): Mica, Iron Oxides].

description_en:
Achieve a naturally radiant bronze glow with **Beesline Sun Tan Oil 200 ml**. This 100% natural formula, enriched with fresh carrot extract, beeswax, and precious oils, ensures a safe, deep, and long-lasting tan. It locks in moisture, hydrates your skin, and enhances its elasticity for a smooth, luminous complexion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Sun Tan Oil 200 ml**
â­ Apply generously to the body before sun exposure.
â­ Reapply regularly, especially after swimming and towel drying.
â­ For fair complexions, mix the oil with Beesline Ultrascreen Cream SPF 50 for enhanced protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Sun Tan Oil 200 ml**
â­ Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil
â­ Cera Alba (Beeswax)
â­ Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Extract
â­ Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil
â­ Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Oil
â­ Parfum
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E)

description_en:
Discover the gentle yet effective cleansing power of **Beesline 3in1 Micellar Water Fragrance Free**. This unique micellar water effectively removes all types of makeup, deeply cleanses, and soothes your skin, making it the perfect step in your daily skincare routine. Thanks to its innovative formula, **Beesline 3in1 Micellar Water Fragrance Free** gently draws out pore-clogging impurities, leaving your skin feeling refreshed and revitalized without over-drying it. It's perfect for use on the face, eyes, and lips, leaving your skin clear and comfortable.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline 3in1 Micellar Water Fragrance Free**:
â­ Use to remove regular makeup: mascara, eyeliner, lipstick, foundation.
â­ For eye makeup: soak a cotton pad with the micellar water.
â­ Press the pad against your closed eyes for a few seconds.
â­ Gently wipe without harsh rubbing.
â­ Rinsing is optional.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline 3in1 Micellar Water Fragrance Free**:
â­ Peg-6 Caprylic/Capric Glycerides
â­ Poloxamer 184
â­ Propylene Glycol
â­ Polysorbate 80
â­ Polyaminopropyl Biguanide
â­ Free from parabens, petrochemicals, phthalates.

#Beesline #MicellarWater #MakeupRemover #ClearSkin #Skincare #FragranceFree #Hydration #Freshness #SaudiBeauty #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Reveal brighter, healthier-looking skin with the **Beesline** Whitening Facial Toner. This gentle cleanser is expertly formulated to remove dirt and oils while rejuvenating and evening out your complexion. Infused with the goodness of natural ingredients, **Beesline** toner offers a refreshing cleanse that enhances skin radiance and promotes an even skin tone, making it the perfect choice for oily to combination skin types.

â­ Gently removes dirt and excess oils.
â­ Rejuvenates and brightens the complexion.
â­ Ideal for oily to combination skin types.
â­ 98% natural origin formula, powered by niacinamide, vitamin C, boldo tree extract, and honey.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline**:
â­ Use twice daily.
â­ Lather the facial wash with water and massage the foam gently onto the face, avoiding the eye area.
â­ Rinse off thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline**:
â­ Aqua (Water).
â­ Decyl Glucoside.
â­ Glycol Distearate.
â­ Glycerin.
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine.
â­ Honey.
â­ Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride.
â­ Diacetyl-Boldine.
â­ Sodium Lactate.
â­ Niacinamide (Vitamin B3).
â­ Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate (Vitamin C).
â­ Cocamide DEA.
â­ Citrus Medica (Lemon) Fruit Juice Extract.
â­ Parfum (Fragrance).
â­ Rosa Damascena (Damask Rose) Flower Extract.
â­ Sodium Benzoate.
â­ Potassium Sorbate.
â­ EDTA.

description_en:
Achieve the perfect tan with **Beesline Brown Tan Dry Feel Oil**. This lightweight, transparent, and non-greasy spray oil is formulated for optimal tanning results quickly and easily. Enriched with a blend of precious oils, it regenerates and replenishes your skin, providing deep moisturization for a healthy-looking, attractive glow.

Product Features:
â­ Lightweight, non-greasy aerosol oil for fast and effective tanning.
â­ Regenerates skin cells, giving it vitality.
â­ Provides deep moisturization for healthy, glowing skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Brown Tan Dry Feel Oil**:
â­ Apply generously to your skin before sun exposure.
â­ Reapply frequently, especially after swimming or towel-drying.
â­ For external use only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Brown Tan Dry Feel Oil**:
â­ Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil.
â­ Isopropyl Myristate.
â­ Butane, Isobutane, Propane.
â­ Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Root Extract.
â­ Olea Europaea (Olive) Oil.
â­ Cyclomethicone.
â­ C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate.
â­ Parfum (Fragrance).
â­ Nigella Sativa (Nigella) Seed Oil.
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E).

#Beesline #Tanning #TanOil #HealthySkin #SkinCare #SelfTan #NaturalOils #SkinMoisturizer #HealthyGlow #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Experience brighter, smoother underarms with **Beesline Roll-On Deodorant Whitening Beauty Pearl 50ml**. This innovative, safe, and highly effective 48-hour antiperspirant deodorant combats body odor, absorbs moisture, and soothes the skin while actively lightening and evening out your skin tone. Enjoy lasting freshness and confidence with its gentle yet powerful formula, leaving your underarms clean and radiant.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Roll-On Deodorant Whitening Beauty Pearl 50ml**
â­ Apply daily to clean, dry underarms.
â­ Apply a thin layer for complete coverage.
â­ Allow to dry completely before dressing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Roll-On Deodorant Whitening Beauty Pearl 50ml**
â­ Aqua, Potassium Alum, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetyl Alcohol, Lumiskin, Teflose, Lactic Acid, Triticum Vulgare Germ Oil, Sodium Lactate, Ceteareth 12, Ceteareth 20, Aloe Barbadensis Extract, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Carum Petroselinum Extract, Olea Europaea Leaf Extract, Propolis, Parfum, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate.

#Beesline #Deodorant #UnderarmWhitening #BodyCare #NaturalProducts #Antiperspirant #RollOn #Beauty #SkinCare #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Rediscover your skin with **Beesline Future Barrier Cream**, the revolutionary cream specifically designed to protect your skin from premature aging signs such as dullness, dryness, fine lines, and wrinkles. Its lightweight, non-greasy formula makes it ideal for all ages and all skin types, effectively fighting the signs of aging. Fortified with 5 essential ceramides, **Beesline Future Barrier Cream** works to restore and strengthen the skin's moisture barrier, helping to smooth lines and wrinkles. Enriched with antioxidants from squalane and grape seed oil, this cream protects, softens, and gives the skin a more youthful and vibrant appearance.

â­ Gentle, fragrance-free formula.
â­ Restores the elasticity and health of the skin barrier.
â­ Suitable for daily use for all ages and skin types.
â­ Protects against dullness and dryness.
â­ Provides deep hydration.
â­ Offers superior softness to the skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Future Barrier Cream**
â­ Apply twice daily to clean, dry skin.
â­ Gently massage the cream onto your face and neck until fully absorbed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Future Barrier Cream**
â­ 5 Essential Ceramides.
â­ Polypeptide-76.
â­ Royal Jelly.
â­ Squalane.
â­ Grape Seed Oil.

#Beesline #FaceCream #SkinHydration #Skincare #AntiAging #YouthfulSkin #Ceramides #Squalane #DailyCare #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Discover **Beesline Age Defense Tinted Facial Fluid Sunscreen SPF 50**, the advanced 3-in-1 formula offering broad-spectrum protection against UVA, UVB, and IR rays. With potent antioxidant and anti-aging properties, **Beesline Age Defense Tinted Facial Fluid Sunscreen SPF 50** safeguards your skin from premature aging signs, imparting a natural radiance. Its fluid, lightweight, and non-greasy formula mattifies the skin, making it an ideal makeup primer with its invisible, matte finish. Perfect for all skin types, especially oily skin, it provides comprehensive protection and superior care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Age Defense Tinted Facial Fluid Sunscreen SPF 50**:
â­ Apply to clean skin once daily before sun exposure.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Age Defense Tinted Facial Fluid Sunscreen SPF 50**:
â­ Broad-spectrum UVA, UVB, and IR protection.
â­ Antioxidant and anti-aging properties.
â­ Fluid, lightweight, and non-greasy formula.
â­ Mattifying effect with an invisible, matte finish.
â­ Suitable for all skin types, especially oily skin.

#Beesline #Sunscreen #Skincare #SunProtection #AntiWrinkle #OilySkin #AntiAging #FaceCare #Cosmetics #SkinHealth

description_en:
Experience purity and freshness with **Beesline 3in1 Micellar Water Fragrance Free**. This effective micellar water is specially formulated to remove all types of makeup, cleanse your skin deeply, and soothe it gently. Its unique formula draws out impurities and pollutants that may clog pores, leaving your skin clean and refreshed without any dryness. Enjoy healthy, radiant skin with every use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline 3in1 Micellar Water Fragrance Free**:

â­ Use to remove everyday makeup such as mascara, eyeliner, lipstick, and foundation.
â­ **For eye makeup removal:** Soak a cotton pad with the micellar water, then gently press it against your closed eyelids for a few seconds. Gently wipe without harsh rubbing. Rinsing is optional.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline 3in1 Micellar Water Fragrance Free**:

â­ Peg-6 Caprylic/Capric Glycerides
â­ Poloxamer 184
â­ Propylene Glycol
â­ Polysorbate 80
â­ Polyaminopropyl Biguanide
â­ Free from parabens, petrochemicals, and phthalates.

#Beesline #MicellarWater #MakeupRemover #Skincare #HealthySkin #SkinCleanser #FragranceFree #SaudiArabia #Beauty #Makeup

description_en:
Revitalize your skin with **Beesline Super Hydrating Serum**, the ultimate solution for intense, sustained hydration. Powered by 10% 4D hyaluronic acid, this serum delivers your most hydrated skin yet, with visible results from the very first use. It provides surface and deep hydration thanks to 4 different molecular weights of hyaluronic acid, enhanced with anti-aging peptides, honey, and pro-vitamin B5 to support and protect your skin barrier.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Super Hydrating Serum**

â­ Use twice daily on damp skin.
â­ Apply up to 3 pumps to the face and neck.
â­ Spread the serum evenly and massage it gently until fully absorbed.
â­ Can be layered with all other Beesline serums for enhanced results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Super Hydrating Serum**

â­ Propanediol.
â­ Glycerin.
â­ Ethylhexylglycerin.
â­ Panthenol.
â­ Phenoxyethanol.
â­ Polysorbate 80.
â­ Pentylene Glycol.
â­ Sodium Hyaluronate.
â­ EDTA.
â­ Soduim Acetylated Hyaluronate.
â­ Honey.
â­ Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer.
â­ Hydroxypropyl cyclodextrin.
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate.
â­ Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract.
â­ Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate.
â­ Pyrus Malus Juice.
â­ Palmitoyl Tripeptide-38.

title_ar: Ø¨ÙŠØ²Ù„ÙŠÙ† Ø³ÙŠØ±ÙˆÙ… Ù„Ù†Ø¶Ø§Ø±Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© ÙˆÙ…Ù‚Ø§ÙˆÙ…Ø© Ø§Ù„ØªØ¬Ø§Ø¹ÙŠØ¯ - 30 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Discover the secret to firmer, radiant skin with Beesline Anti-Wrinkle & Radiance Serum. 

This powerful serum is boosted with 10% niacinamide to improve the look of fine lines and uneven skin tone and texture, alongside a beginner dose of 0.05% retinol, the star anti-wrinkle ingredient. It will leave your skin feeling revitalized, youthful, and glowing, with visible results in just 2 weeks for a refreshed and rejuvenated complexion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for Beesline Anti-Wrinkle & Radiance Serum:
â­ To be used at night. Start with one night a week, then gradually increase to nightly application as tolerated.
â­ Apply up to 3 pumps to the face and neck.
â­ Spread the serum evenly and massage it gently until fully absorbed.
â­ Can be layered as step 2, after the Super Hydrating Serum for enhanced efficacy.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of Beesline Anti-Wrinkle & Radiance Serum:
â­ Propanediol. Niacinamide. Glyceryl. Stearate SE. Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride. Polysorbate 80. Glycerin. Cyclopentasiloxane. Methyl methacrylate crosspolymer. Phenoxyethanol. Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract. Dimethicone. Allantoin. Xanthan Gum. Chlorphenesin. 1,2-Hexanediol. Cetearyl Alcohol. Citric Acid. Tocopheryl Acetate. BHT. Polysilicone-11. Sodium Hyaluronate. Sapphire Powder. EDTA. Royal Jelly. Curcumin. Retinol. Polysorbate 20. Hydroxypropyl Cyclodextrin. Palmitoyl Tripeptide-38.

#Beesline #Serum #SkinRadiance #AntiWrinkle #Skincare #Retinol #Niacinamide #Hydration #HealthySkin #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Say goodbye to unwanted odors with **Beesline Roll-On Deodorant, Fragrance-Free, 50ml (Pack of 2)**. Enjoy fresh, dry underarms all day long thanks to its innovative skin-friendly formula that absorbs moisture and prevents odor. It moisturizes sensitive underarm skin, providing long-lasting comfort.

â­ Gentle formula suitable for sensitive skin.
â­ Ideal for Hajjis and those performing Umrah during Ihram.
â­ Absorbs moisture and prevents unpleasant odors.
â­ Moisturizes underarm skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Roll-On Deodorant, Fragrance-Free, 50ml (Pack of 2)**:
â­ Apply a thin layer to clean, dry underarms.
â­ Allow to dry completely before dressing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Roll-On Deodorant, Fragrance-Free, 50ml (Pack of 2)**:
â­ Aqua.
â­ Vegetable Glycerin.
â­ Mel (Honey).
â­ Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Extract.
â­ Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract.
â­ Potassium Alum.
â­ Glyceryl Stearate.
â­ Cetyl Alcohol.
â­ Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Extract.
â­ Carbomer.
â­ Ceteareth-12.
â­ Ceteareth-20.
â­ Polysorbate 80.
â­ Lactic Acid.
â­ Sodium Lactate.
â­ Propolis.
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E).
â­ Potassium Sorbate.
â­ Sodium Benzoate.
â­ Propanediol.
â­ Rhamnose.
â­ Glucose.
â­ Glucuronic Acid.

description_en:
Achieve a radiant, sun-kissed glow with **Beesline Suntan Oil Gold 200 Ml**. This luxurious, all-natural blend of nourishing oils is specially formulated to help you achieve a deep, healthy tan. **Beesline Suntan Oil Gold 200 Ml** combines the benefits of hydrating beeswax and shimmering gold particles to provide your skin with intense hydration and superior protection, ensuring a safe and long-lasting bronze hue. Indulge your skin with a touch of golden luxury.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Suntan Oil Gold 200 Ml**
â­ Apply generously all over the body before sun exposure.
â­ Reapply regularly, especially after swimming or towel drying, to maintain protection and color.
â­ For very fair complexions, it is recommended to mix this oil with Beesline Ultrascreen SPF 50 for maximum safety.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Suntan Oil Gold 200 Ml**
â­ Sweet Almond Oil.
â­ Sesame Oil.
â­ Sunflower Oil.
â­ Coconut Oil.
â­ Wheatgerm Oil.
â­ Beeswax.
â­ Cocoa Butter.
â­ Provitamin B5.
â­ Vitamin E.
â­ Gold.

#Beesline #SuntanOil #NaturalTan #BronzeSkin #SaudiSkincare #Gold #SkinHydration #Sunscreen #SafeTanning #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Achieve a deep, healthy tan with **Beesline Brown Tan Dry Feel Oil**. This lightweight, dry-touch formula provides a uniform color without greasiness, offering superior protection against harmful sun rays. It regenerates, smooths, and deeply moisturizes your skin for the ultimate tanning experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Brown Tan Dry Feel Oil**:
â­ Spray generously onto the body before sunbathing.
â­ Hold the can 15cm away from the skin while spraying.
â­ Reapply regularly, especially after swimming and towel-drying, to ensure continuous protection and tanning.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Brown Tan Dry Feel Oil**:
â­ Sweet Almond Oil: For moisturizing and nourishing the skin.
â­ Carrot Oil: Enhances tan color and protects against damage.
â­ Olive Oil: For deep hydration and superior smoothness.
â­ Nigella Seed Oil: For its antioxidant and regenerative properties.
â­ Vitamin E: For protection and repair.

description_en:
Achieve your clearest, most balanced skin yet with **Beesline Sebum Control Balancing Serum**. Our unique formula is powered by 2% salicylic acid, the ultimate BHA for oily and acne-prone skin, and 2.5% lactic acid, the gentlest AHA, highly effective at fading acne scars. This serum unclogs pores and reduces the look of blemishes, all while soothing and hydrating your skin without stripping it, leaving you with a perfectly balanced complexion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Sebum Control Balancing Serum**:
â­ To be used in the morning.
â­ Apply up to 3 pumps to the face and neck.
â­ Spread the serum evenly and massage it until fully absorbed.
â­ Can be layered as step 1, before the Super Hydrating Serum.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Sebum Control Balancing Serum**:
â­ Salicylic Acid: An exfoliating BHA that unclogs pores for a clearer complexion.
â­ Lactic Acid: A gentle exfoliating AHA that improves skin tone and texture, promoting cell turnover.
â­ Propolis: A natural resin with antimicrobial and anti-inflammatory properties, helping to purify and soothe the skin.
â­ Hyaluronic Acid (Sodium Hyaluronate): A hydrating ingredient that attracts and retains moisture for a plumper, smoother complexion.

#Beesline #BeeslineSerum #SkinCare #OilySkin #AcneProneSkin #AcneTreatment #SalicylicAcid #LacticAcid #HealthySkin #SaudiArabia

description_en:
**Beesline Micellar Water** Fragrance Free removes makeup, cleanses your skin effectively and soothes it. It draws out pore-clogging impurities and leaves the skin refreshed without over-drying it.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Micellar Water**:
â­ Use to remove regular makeup: mascara, eyeliner, lipstick, foundation.
â­ For eye makeup: soak a cotton pad with the micellar water.
â­ Press the pad against your closed eyes for few seconds.
â­ Gently wipe without harsh rubbing. Rinsing is optional.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Micellar Water**:
â­ Peg-6 caprylic/capric glycerides.
â­ Poloxamer 184.
â­ Propylene glycol.
â­ Polysorbate 80.
â­ Polyaminopropyl biguanide.
â­ Free from parabens, petrochemicals, phthalates.

title_ar: Ø¨ÙŠØ²Ù„ÙŠÙ† Ø£Ø¯Ø§Ø¨ØªÙˆØ¬ÙŠÙ† ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ù„Ø­Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ© Ø§Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© - 50 Ù…Ù„ | ØªØ±Ø·ÙŠØ¨ Ø¹Ù…ÙŠÙ‚ ÙˆØªÙ‡Ø¯Ø¦Ø© Ù„Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø©
description_en:
**Beesline Adaptogen Barrier Cream** is your ultimate ally to restore and defend the skin barrier against harsh external factors and dryness. Specially formulated for dry, irritated, and damaged skin, this rich, non-greasy cream provides deep hydration and instant comfort. Fortified with 5 essential ceramides to strengthen the moisture barrier, and Polypeptide 59 and Ashwagandha to soothe redness and inflammation. The blend of Squalane, Shea Butter, and Jojoba Oil ensures superior moisturization that locks in hydration without clogging pores, leaving you with softer, healthier, brighter, and more elastic skin.

â­ A daily moisturizer effective against redness and skin irritation.
â­ Ideal for dry, irritated, and damaged skin.
â­ Provides deep hydration and extreme softness to the skin.
â­ Restores and strengthens the skin barrier with five essential ceramides.
â­ Restores elasticity and health of the skin barrier.
â­ Suitable for daily use for all skin types.
â­ Protects skin from dryness and fading.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Adaptogen Barrier Cream**
â­ Apply an appropriate amount to clean skin.
â­ Use twice daily, morning and evening.
â­ Gently massage the cream onto your face and neck until fully absorbed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Adaptogen Barrier Cream**
â­ 5 Essential Ceramides: Strengthen skin cell cohesion, retain essential moisture, prevent moisture loss, and protect from environmental stressors.
â­ Polypeptide-59: A breakthrough ingredient that calms sensitive skin, reduces redness and irritation, and alleviates itching sensations.
â­ Ashwagandha (Withania Somnifera Root Extract): A powerful antioxidant plant that soothes the skin and reduces visible signs of irritation and dryness.
â­ Squalane: Deeply moisturizes, promotes collagen synthesis, aids in skin barrier repair, and boosts hydration without clogging pores.
â­ Shea Butter: A nourishing ingredient rich in essential fatty acids and vitamins that moisturizes, soothes, protects the skin, and improves its elasticity.
â­ Jojoba Oil: Provides lightweight hydration and regulates the skin's natural oil production, leaving it balanced and hydrated.

#Beesline #BarrierRepair #DeepHydration #Skincare #HealthySkin #AntiRedness #Ceramides #Ashwagandha #SaudiSkincare #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Discover the protective and restorative power of **Beesline Everyone Barrier Cream**.

This barrier-repairing cream works to shield your skin from dullness, dryness, fine lines, and wrinkles. Its lightweight, non-greasy formula is ideal for combating signs of aging for all ages and skin types. **Beesline Everyone Barrier Cream** is enhanced with 5 essential ceramides to restore and strengthen your skin's moisture barrier, smoothing lines and wrinkles for a more youthful appearance. Enriched with antioxidant Squalane and Grape Seed Oil, it protects and softens the skin. Experience intense hydration with multi-layer Hyaluronic Acid for deep moisturization and ultimate smoothness. It's also packed with antioxidant Organic Kale and Pro-Vitamin B5 to lock in moisture and keep your skin refreshed.

â­ Ideal for normal and combination skin.
â­ Gentle, fragrance-free formula.
â­ Restores skin barrier elasticity and health.
â­ Suitable for daily use.
â­ Protects against dullness and dryness.
â­ Deep hydration.
â­ Ultimate smoothness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Everyone Barrier Cream**:
â­ Use twice per day.
â­ Gently massage the cream onto your face until fully absorbed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Everyone Barrier Cream**:
â­ Ceramides, Hyaluronic Acid, and Vitamins.

description_en:
**Beesline Sun Tan Oil** is your ultimate companion for achieving a natural, captivating bronze glow. This 100% natural formula, enriched with antioxidants and essential nutrients, provides a long-lasting tan while helping to protect your skin. With **Beesline Sun Tan Oil**, enjoy a beautifully tanned complexion that stays healthy and is shielded from harmful UV radiation that can accelerate skin aging. It's the perfect choice for those seeking an even, attractive skin tone while maintaining its health and vitality.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Sun Tan Oil**:
â­ Apply generously to the entire body before sun exposure.
â­ Reapply regularly, especially after swimming or sweating.
â­ For fair complexions, it's recommended to mix it with Beesline Ultrascreen Cream Invisible Sun filter SPF 50+ for enhanced protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Sun Tan Oil**:
â­ Beeswax
â­ Almond Oil
â­ Coconut Oil
â­ Wheat Germ Oil
â­ Nigella Seed Oil
â­ Carrot Extract
â­ Vitamin E

description_en:
Protect your skin with **Beesline Cream** Ultra Screen SPF50.

This advanced hybrid formula combines non-nano mineral and organic sun protection, offering a robust shield against UVA, UVB, and IR rays. Enriched with precious oils and beeswax, **Beesline Cream** works to prevent dehydration, while sesame and henna provide natural sun-filtering properties. Its invisible, matte finish makes it the perfect base under makeup, leaving your skin protected and ready for a flawless look.

â­ Non-nano hybrid sunscreen with SPF50
â­ Full spectrum protection against UVA, UVB, IR rays
â­ Enriched with precious oils and beeswax to prevent dehydration
â­ Invisible and matte finish, ideal for wear under makeup

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Cream**:
â­ Apply generously to skin 15 minutes before sun exposure.
â­ Reapply frequently every 2 hours, and directly after swimming or towel-drying.
â­ For external use only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Cream**:
â­ Aqua (Water). Octocrylene. Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate. Cetyl Alcohol. Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil. Vp/Hexadecene Copolymer. Glyceryl Stearate. Titanium Dioxide. Beeswax. Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil. Ceteareth-20. Lawsonia Inermis (Henna) Leaf Extract. Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E). Xanthan Gum. Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Oil. Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil. Lactic Acid. Parfum (Fragrance). EDTA.

#Beesline #Sunscreen #SPF50 #Skincare #HealthySkin #Beauty #Moisturizing #MakeupBase #SaudiArabia #Summer

description_en:
Experience superior freshness and protection with **Beesline Deo Whitening Spray Elder Rose**, expertly formulated to provide up to 72 hours of protection against sweat and odor. This effective spray absorbs moisture, helps delay the appearance of unwanted hair, and soothes and moisturizes your skin for brighter, fresher underarms.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Beesline Deo Whitening Spray Elder Rose**:
â­ Use daily for refreshed skin.
â­ Hold the can 15cm away and spray onto clean, dry underarms.
â­ Allow to dry completely before dressing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Beesline Deo Whitening Spray Elder Rose**:
â­ Butane, Isobutane, Propane for spray efficacy.
â­ Cyclomethicone for a smooth application.
â­ C12-15 Alkyl Lactate for skin nourishment.
â­ Aqua, Potassium Alum, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Extract for soothing and moisturizing.
â­ Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Extract, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Extract for skin brightening.
â­ Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate (Vitamin C) for enhanced whitening.
â­ Lumiskin and Teflose for improved radiance.
â­ Lactic Acid, Sodium Lactate for skin balance.
â­ Niacin (Vitamin B3) for skin improvement.
â­ Octyldodecanol, Parfum, Propolis for a pleasant fragrance and freshness.

title_en: Bio-Oil Skin Care Multipurpose Oil 200 ml
title_ar: Ø¨ÙŠÙˆ-Ø§ÙˆÙŠÙ„ Ø²ÙŠØª Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙŠØ© Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ù…ØªØ¹Ø¯Ø¯ Ø§Ù„Ø§Ø³ØªØ®Ø¯Ø§Ù… 200 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Discover the transformative power of **Bio-Oil Skin Care Multipurpose Oil 200 ml**, your ultimate solution for improving the appearance of skin marks and keeping it smooth and supple. This potent oil enhances skin elasticity during pregnancy, helps to firm aging and wrinkled skin on both the face and body, and maintains optimal hydration. Featuring a lightweight, fast-absorbing formula enriched with PurCellin Oilâ„¢, **Bio-Oil Skin Care Multipurpose Oil 200 ml** revitalizes your skin for a healthier, more radiant complexion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bio-Oil Skin Care Multipurpose Oil 200 ml**
â­ Apply twice daily for a minimum of three months for best results.
â­ During pregnancy, use twice daily from the third month until after childbirth.
â­ Individual results may vary.
â­ For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes.
â­ Keep out of reach of children. Store away from direct sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bio-Oil Skin Care Multipurpose Oil 200 ml**
â­ Mineral Oil (Paraffinum Liquidum)
â­ Triisononanoin
â­ Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate
â­ Isopropyl Myristate
â­ Retinyl Palmitate (Vitamin A)
â­ Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E)
â­ Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil (Chamomile Oil)
â­ Lavandula Angustifolia Oil (Lavender Oil)
â­ Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Oil (Rosemary Oil)
â­ Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract (Calendula Oil)
â­ Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil
â­ Bisabolol
â­ Tocopherol
â­ Fragrance
â­ Limonene, Linalool, Citronellol, Geraniol, Citral, Farnesol, Hydroxycitronellal, Eugenol, Coumarin, Benzyl Salicylate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Cinnamal, Cinnamyl Alcohol
â­ CI 26100

#BioOil #SkinCareOil #BodyCare #Hydration #StretchMarks #AntiAging #HealthySkin #SaudiBeauty #MassageOil #BodyMoisturizer

shortdescription_en: Multipurpose skin care oil to improve the appearance of skin marks and boost hydration.

title_en: Bio-Oil Skin Care Multipurpose Oil 60 ml
title_ar: Ø¨ÙŠÙˆ-Ø§ÙˆÙŠÙ„ Ø²ÙŠØª Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙŠØ© Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ù…ØªØ¹Ø¯Ø¯ Ø§Ù„Ø§Ø³ØªØ®Ø¯Ø§Ù…Ø§Øª 60 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Discover the secret to radiant and rejuvenated skin with **Bio-Oil Skin Care Multipurpose Oil 60 ml**. This exceptional oil helps improve the appearance of stretch marks and scars, leaving your skin smooth and soft. It's ideal for pregnant women to enhance skin elasticity and maintain its health and hydration. It's also effective in softening and toning mature, sagging skin, and deeply moisturizing. Thanks to its light formulation containing **PurCellin Oilâ„¢**, it absorbs quickly without leaving a greasy residue.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bio-Oil Skin Care Multipurpose Oil 60 ml**:
â­ Apply twice daily for a minimum of three months for optimal results.
â­ For pregnant women: Use twice daily from the third month of pregnancy until post-childbirth.
â­ Results may vary from person to person.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bio-Oil Skin Care Multipurpose Oil 60 ml**:
â­ Paraffinum Liquidum, Triisononanoin, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Isopropyl Myristate, Retinyl Palmitate, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil.
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Oil, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract.
â­ Glycine Soja Oil, Bisabolol, Tocopherol, Parfum.
â­ Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Amyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Coumarin, Eugenol, Farnesol, Geraniol, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Linalool, CI 26100.

shortdescription_en: **Bio-Oil** multipurpose oil to improve scars, stretch marks, and deeply moisturize skin. Light and fast-absorbing formula.

title_en: Bio-Oil Skincare Multipurpose Oil 125 ml
title_ar: Ø¨ÙŠÙˆ- Ø£ÙˆÙŠÙ„ Ø²ÙŠØª Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙŠØ© Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ù…ØªØ¹Ø¯Ø¯ Ø§Ù„Ø§Ø³ØªØ®Ø¯Ø§Ù… 125 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Busy lifestyles can lead to neglecting skin health, resulting in a dull appearance and premature aging. **Bio-Oil** Skincare Multipurpose Oil 125 ml is your perfect solution. Its fast-absorbing formula, containing Purcellin Oil, penetrates quickly to unclog pores, eliminate acne marks, and dirt build-up. It's proven effective in improving the appearance of scars, stretch marks, dark patches, and uneven skin tone, while also helping to naturally brighten the complexion. Dermatologically tested and approved by skincare professionals, it has won numerous awards and is available in over 18 countries.

â­ Reduces the appearance of stretch marks and tightens the skin for a more youthful look.
â­ Clinically tested, scientifically backed, and dermatologist approved.
â­ Suitable for all skin types, including oily, dry, and sensitive, with a non-greasy texture.
â­ Helps to eliminate scars and acne, and restore moisture to dry skin.
â­ Safe for daily use to lighten skin and reduce hyperpigmentation.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bio-Oil**:
â­ Before bed, wash your skin with lukewarm water and apply a tablespoon of oil. Leave it overnight and wash in the morning.
â­ Alternatively, apply to your skin 30 minutes before bathing and rinse with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bio-Oil**:
â­ Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract (Calendula Oil)
â­ Lavandula Angustifolia Oil (Lavender Oil)
â­ Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Oil (Rosemary Oil)
â­ Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil (Chamomile Oil)
â­ Vitamins: Retinyl Palmitate (Vitamin A), Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E)
â­ Mineral Oil (Paraffinum)

title_ar: Ø¨ÙŠÙˆ- Ø£ÙˆÙŠÙ„ Ø¬Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ø§ÙØ© 200Ù…Ù„ | ØªØ±Ø·ÙŠØ¨ Ø¹Ù…ÙŠÙ‚ Ù„Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ø§ÙØ©
description_en:
Introducing **Bio-Oil Dry Skin Gel**, the next generation in dry skin treatment. This innovative formula surpasses traditional creams and lotions by containing 100% active oil, eliminating inactive water for maximum skin hydration. The easily absorbed gel format of **Bio-Oil Dry Skin Gel** leaves your skin feeling soft and supple.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bio-Oil Dry Skin Gel**

â­ Apply a small amount to dry skin as needed.
â­ Use less product than you would with a cream.
â­ Suitable for sensitive skin and is non-comedogenic.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bio-Oil Dry Skin Gel**

â­ Paraffinum Liquidum (Mineral Oil), Isopropyl Palmitate, Triisononanoin, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Glycerin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Aqua (Water), Isopropyl Myristate, Urea, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Isostearyl Isostearate, C26-28 Alkyl Dimethicone, Sodium Lactate, Gluconolactone, Sucrose Laurate, Sodium PCA, Lanolin, Bisabolol, Niacinamide, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sucrose Stearate, Butylene Glycol, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Silica, BHT, Octyldodecyl PCA, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Linoleic Acid, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Parfum (Fragrance), Retinyl Palmitate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Lactic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Calendula Officinalis Extract, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil, Tocopherol, Linolenic Acid, CI 17200.

description_en:
Discover the power of **Bio-Oil Dry Skin Gel 50ml**, the next generation in dry skin treatment. This innovative product goes beyond traditional creams, lotions, and body butters by replacing inactive water with pure oil, making it 100% active and highly effective. Its breakthrough gel format ensures deep nourishment and long-lasting hydration for your skin, absorbing quickly without a greasy residue.

â­ Rich formula with natural oils and moisturizing ingredients.
â­ Provides intense hydration for dry and cracked skin.
â­ Absorbs quickly, leaving no oily feel.
â­ Suitable for sensitive skin and non-comedogenic.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bio-Oil Dry Skin Gel 50ml**:
â­ Apply a small amount to dry skin as needed.
â­ Use less than you would when applying a regular cream.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bio-Oil Dry Skin Gel 50ml**:
â­ Paraffinum Liquidum (Mineral Oil)
â­ Isopropyl Palmitate
â­ Triisononanoin
â­ Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate
â­ Glycerin
â­ Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Isopropyl Myristate
â­ Urea
â­ Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride
â­ Isostearyl Isostearate
â­ C26-28 Alkyl Dimethicone
â­ Sodium Lactate
â­ Gluconolactone
â­ Sucrose Laurate
â­ Sodium PCA
â­ Lanolin
â­ Bisabolol
â­ Niacinamide
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate
â­ Sucrose Stearate
â­ Butylene Glycol
â­ Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer
â­ Silica
â­ BHT
â­ Octyldodecyl PCA
â­ Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil
â­ Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil
â­ Linoleic Acid
â­ Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil
â­ Parfum (Fragrance)
â­ Retinyl Palmitate
â­ Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil
â­ Lactic Acid
â­ Sodium Hyaluronate
â­ Calendula Officinalis Extract
â­ Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil
â­ Tocopherol
â­ Linolenic Acid
â­ CI 17200

description_en:
Renew your skin with **Bio-Oil** Dry Skin Gel, an innovative formula that goes beyond traditional creams and lotions.

**Bio-Oil** Dry Skin Gel is 100% active, replacing inactive water in other formulations with pure, nourishing oils. This transformation into an easily absorbed gel format delivers deep and effective hydration to your skin, leaving it soft, smooth, and healthy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bio-Oil** Dry Skin Gel:
â­ Apply a small amount to dry skin as required.
â­ Use less than you would if applying a cream for optimal results.
â­ Suitable for sensitive skin and non-comedogenic.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bio-Oil** Dry Skin Gel:
â­ Paraffinum Liquidum (Mineral Oil), Isopropyl Palmitate, Triisononanoin, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Glycerin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Aqua (Water), Isopropyl Myristate, Butylene Glycol, Lactic Acid, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Niacinamide, Tocopheryl Acetate, Linoleic Acid, Linolenic Acid, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Retinyl Palmitate, Bisabolol, Calendula Officinalis Extract, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil.

description_en:
Experience a new level of body hydration with **Bio-Oil** Body Lotion.

This pioneering lotion boasts a remarkably lightweight formula, making it significantly thinner than conventional body lotions, yet it contains twice the amount of moisturizing oils. The innovative **Bio-Oil** formulation combines superior lightness with high efficacy for deep and lasting hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bio-Oil** Body Lotion:
â­ Shake before use to ensure even distribution of oils.
â­ Apply twice daily, morning and evening, for optimal results.
â­ Gently massage in a circular motion until fully absorbed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bio-Oil** Body Lotion:
â­ Aqua, Dimethicone, Isopropyl Palmitate, Ethylhexyl Cocoate, Isododecane, Isopropyl Myristate, Urea, Polyglyceryl-2 Dipolyhydroxystearate, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Sodium Lactate, Dipentaerythrityl Hexacaprylate/Hexacaprate, Gluconolactone, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil, Calendula Officinalis Extract, Butyrospermum Parkii Oil, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Glycine Soja Oil, Isostearyl Isostearate, Bisabolol, Octyldodecyl PCA, Retinyl Palmitate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Linoleic Acid, Linolenic Acid, Tocopherol, Sodium PCA, Sodium Hyaluronate, Lactic Acid, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Propylene Carbonate.

description_en:
Experience superior body moisturization with **Bio-Oil** Body Lotion, setting a new standard for lightness and efficacy. This revolutionary lotion is significantly thinner than conventional body lotions yet delivers twice the oil content for unparalleled hydration. Its ultra-light feel combined with rich oil properties is made possible by **Bio-Oil**'s innovative formulation.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bio-Oil**:
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Massage into the skin in a circular motion until fully absorbed.
â­ Apply twice daily, in the morning and evening, for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bio-Oil**:
â­ Aqua, Dimethicone, Isopropyl Palmitate, Ethylhexyl Cocoate, Isododecane, Isopropyl Myristate, Urea.
â­ Polyglyceryl-2 Dipolyhydroxystearate, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Dicaprylyl Carbonate.
â­ Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Sodium Lactate, Dipentaerythrityl Hexacaprylate/Hexacaprate.
â­ Gluconolactone, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil.
â­ Calendula Officinalis Extract, Butyrospermum Parkii Oil, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Glycine Soja Oil.
â­ Isostearyl Isostearate, Bisabolol, Octyldodecyl PCA, Retinyl Palmitate, Tocopheryl Acetate.
â­ Linoleic Acid, Linolenic Acid, Tocopherol, Sodium PCA, Sodium Hyaluronate.
â­ Lactic Acid, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Propylene Carbonate.

description_en:
**Biomil Plus Baby Milk (3)** is a nutritious formula specifically designed to support your child's healthy growth and development from 1 to 3 years of age. This nutritionally complete, whole milk is rich in iron and essential vitamins like A, C, and D, which contribute to supporting your child's immune system naturally. It's an ideal nutritional supplement for your child's diet, ensuring they receive the nutrients needed for vital growth stages.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Biomil Plus Baby Milk (3)**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparing.
â­ Boil drinking water for five minutes and allow it to cool to a suitable temperature.
â­ Wash the bottle (nursing bottle) or cup and nipple thoroughly until no milk remains.
â­ Use only the scoop enclosed with the product. Level the powder with the measuring rim for the correct quantity.
â­ Add the correct amount of powder to the water, ensuring not to exceed or fall short of the recommended number of scoops to avoid health issues.
â­ Cover the bottle and shake well for 10 seconds to ensure the powder dissolves completely.
â­ Use prepared feeds within one hour and discard any remaining quantity.
â­ Do not heat feeds in the microwave to prevent burns.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Biomil Plus Baby Milk (3)**:
â­ Skimmed cow's milk, Maltodextrin, Lactose, Whey protein concentrate, Palm olein, Low erucic rapeseed oil, Sunflower oil.
â­ Emulsifier (Soy lecithin), Calcium citrate, Fish oil (from tuna), Bifidus culture, Lactobacillus culture.
â­ Essential vitamins and minerals to support growth and health.

#Biomil #BabyMilk #KidsNutrition #HealthyGrowth #KidsImmunity #BiomilPlus #GrowingUpMilk #SaudiArabia #Children #ChildHealth

title_en: Biomil Plus Baby Milk (2) 800 Gm - For Healthy Growth Support

description_en:
Discover optimal nutrition for your baby with **Biomil Plus Baby Milk (2)**, designed to support their healthy development from 6 to 12 months.

During this crucial developmental stage, where your baby begins to mimic sounds and gestures, sit up, crawl, and play with others, providing proper nutrition and stimulation plays a vital role in their learning and success. **Biomil Plus Baby Milk (2)** offers the essential follow-on formula that forms a liquid part of their diet during weaning and beyond, fortified with iron for healthy growth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Biomil Plus Baby Milk (2)**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparing the feed.
â­ Wash the bottle (nursing bottle), cup, and teat thoroughly to remove any remaining feed residue.
â­ Boil for five minutes. Keep covered until use.
â­ Boil drinking water for five minutes and allow it to cool to the appropriate temperature.
â­ Pour the specified amount of boiled and cooled water into the bottle or cup according to the feeding table on the can.
â­ Use only the enclosed scoop and level off any excess powder.
â­ Add the prescribed number of level scoops as per the feeding table.
â­ Mix thoroughly until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Close the can tightly after each use and store it in a cool, dry place.
â­ Must be used within 4 weeks of opening the can.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Biomil Plus Baby Milk (2)**:
â­ Citric Acid, Taurine, Nucleotides (Cytidine-5â€²-monophosphate, Disodium Uridine-5â€²-monophosphate, Adenosine-5â€²-monophosphate, Disodium Inosine-5â€²-monophosphate, Disodium Guanosine-5â€²-monophosphate).
â­ Antioxidants (Mixed Tocopherols Concentrate, Ascorbyl Palmitate), Lutein (from Marigold).
â­ Vitamins: Choline Chloride, Vitamin C, Inositol, Vitamin E, Niacin, Pantothenic Acid, Vitamin A, Carotenoids, Vitamin B1, Vitamin B2, Vitamin D, Vitamin B6, Folic Acid, Vitamin K, Biotin, Vitamin B12.
â­ Minerals: Potassium Citrate, Sodium Citrate, Calcium Hydroxide, Magnesium Chloride, Sodium Chloride, Potassium Hydroxide, Calcium Chloride, Potassium Carbonate, Zinc Sulfate, Copper Sulfate, Manganese Sulfate.

title_ar: Ø¨ÙŠÙˆÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ø¨Ù„Ø³ Ù„ÙˆÙ…Ù†ÙŠÙˆ ØªØ±ÙƒÙŠØ¨Ø© Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ù…ØºØ°ÙŠØ© 400 Ø¬Ù…
description_en:
Discover the nutritional power of **Biomil Plus Lumneo 400 Gm**, a complete milk formula specially designed to support your baby's growth from birth to 12 months. This formula is low in lactose, making it an ideal choice for infants with digestive issues. **Biomil Plus Lumneo 400 Gm** is a full-cream growing-up milk, rich in iron and vitamins A, C, and D that contribute to the normal function of the immune system. It also serves as a nutritious supplement to support your baby's diet, setting the stage for healthy development and optimal cognitive and physical growth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Biomil Plus Lumneo**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparation.
â­ Wash the bottle or cup, teat, and cap thoroughly until no milk remains.
â­ Boil drinking water for five minutes and allow it to cool.
â­ Use only the scoop provided with **Biomil Plus Lumneo**, leveling the powder for the correct quantity.
â­ Add the correct amount of powder to the water. Do not alter proportions without medical advice.
â­ Close the bottle and shake it well until the powder is fully dissolved.
â­ Use prepared feeds within one hour and discard any leftover amount.
â­ Do not heat feeds in the microwave to avoid potential burns.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Biomil Plus Lumneo**:
â­ Skimmed milk powder.
â­ Maltodextrin, lactose, whey protein concentrate.
â­ Vegetable oils (palm olein, rapeseed oil, sunflower oil).
â­ Emulsifier (soy lecithin).
â­ Calcium citrate, fish oil (from tuna).
â­ Bifidus and Lactobacillus cultures.
â­ Essential vitamins and minerals for infant development.

#BiomilPlus #BabyMilk #InfantFormula #BabyNutrition #BabyCare #HealthyGrowth #SaudiArabia #KSA #Riyadh #Jeddah

description_en:
Ensure your baby gets the best start with **Biomil Plus Baby Milk (1)**, meticulously formulated for healthy infants from birth to 6 months when breastfeeding isn't possible. This advanced formula is packed with essential vitamins, minerals, iron, Omega-3, Vitamin D, and Calcium to support your baby's rapid growth, brain development, and overall well-being. Trust **Biomil Plus Baby Milk (1)** for complete and balanced nutrition.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Biomil Plus Baby Milk (1)**
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparing the formula.
â­ Wash the bottle or cup, teat, and cap completely.
â­ Boil drinking water for five minutes and allow it to cool.
â­ Use only the scoop provided in the container and level off the powder.
â­ Pour the exact amount of lukewarm water into the bottle or cup.
â­ Add the exact number of level scoops of powder as per the feeding table.
â­ Stir the contents of the cup or shake the capped bottle well until the formula is fully dissolved.
â­ Close the can tightly after each use and store it in a cool, dry place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Biomil Plus Baby Milk (1)**
â­ Whey Protein Concentrate.
â­ Skimmed Cowâ€™s Milk.
â­ Palm Olein, Lactose.
â­ Low Erucic Acid Rapeseed Oil, Coconut Oil, High Oleic Sunflower Oil.
â­ Maltodextrin.
â­ Fish Oil (from Tuna).
â­ Emulsifier (Soy Lecithin).
â­ Vegetable Oil (from Mortierella Alpina).
â­ L-Phenylalanine, Bifidobacterium Lactis.
â­ Taurine, L-Histidine, Inositol.
â­ Vitamins and Minerals.

Discover **Biomil Plus Baby Milk (3) 400 gm**, the ideal nutrition for your growing child aged 1 to 3 years. This nourishing milk is fortified with iron and essential vitamins like A, C, and D, along with nutrients that support your child's immune system and promote healthy development. **Biomil Plus Baby Milk (3) 400 gm** is a nutritionally designed, full cream milk that contributes to strong bones and healthy brain development.

â­ Measure the required amount of water as per the feeding chart on the can.
â­ Wash the bottle or cup and teat thoroughly.
â­ Use the scoop provided with the product, level the powder for the correct amount.
â­ Add the correct amount of powder to the water, cover the bottle, and shake well until the powder is dissolved.
â­ Use prepared feeds within one hour and discard any remaining.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Biomil Plus Baby Milk (3) 400 gm**:
â­ Skimmed cow's milk powder
â­ Maltodextrin, Lactose, Whey protein concentrate
â­ Vegetable oils (Palm olein, Rapeseed oil, Sunflower oil)
â­ Emulsifier (Soy lecithin)
â­ Calcium citrate, Fish oil (from tuna)
â­ Bifidus culture, Lactobacillus culture
â­ Essential vitamins and minerals to support immunity and growth.

description_en:
Make your baby's growth an enjoyable journey with **Biomil Plus Baby Milk (2)**, the complete nutritional formula designed to support your infants from 6 to 12 months. During this vital stage, your baby acquires new skills daily such as mimicking, sitting, and crawling, requiring proper nutrition to stimulate cognitive and physical development. **Biomil Plus Baby Milk (2)** provides optimal nutrition that helps build a strong foundation for their future.

**ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for Biomil Plus Baby Milk (2)**
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparing your baby's feed.
â­ Wash the bottle or cup and teat thoroughly until no milk remains.
â­ Boil for five minutes. Keep covered until use.
â­ Boil drinking water for five minutes; allow to cool slightly.
â­ Pour the specified amount of lukewarm water into the bottle or cup according to the feeding table on the can.
â­ Use only the enclosed scoop, level the powder, and remove any excess.
â­ Add the prescribed number of level scoops according to the feeding table.
â­ Stir the contents of the cup or shake the capped bottle well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Close the can tightly after each use and store in a cool, dry place. Must be used within 4 weeks of opening.

**ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of Biomil Plus Baby Milk (2)**
â­ Citric Acid, Taurine, Nucleotides (Cytidine-5'-Monophosphate, Disodium Uridine-5'-Monophosphate, Adenosine-5'-Monophosphate, Disodium Inosine-5'-Monophosphate, Disodium Guanosine-5'-Monophosphate).
â­ Antioxidants (Mixed Tocopherols Concentrate, Ascorbyl Palmitate), Lutein (from Marigold).
â­ Vitamins: Choline Chloride, Vitamin C, Inositol, Vitamin E, Niacin, Pantothenic Acid, Vitamin A, Carotenoids, Vitamin B1, Vitamin B2, Vitamin D, Vitamin B6, Folic Acid, Vitamin K, Biotin, Vitamin B12.
â­ Minerals: Potassium Citrate, Sodium Citrate, Calcium Hydroxide, Magnesium Chloride, Sodium Chloride, Potassium Hydroxide, Calcium Chloride, Potassium Carbonate, Zinc Sulfate, Copper Sulfate, Manganese Sulfate.

#BiomilPlus #BabyFormula #InfantNutrition #BabyGrowth #WeaningStage #BabyHealth #SaudiArabia #Infant #Motherhood #BabyCare

description_en:
Product Description:

**Biomil Plus HA** is an advanced infant formula specially designed to meet the needs of infants and children suffering from milk protein allergy. Its low-allergenic formula provides optimal nutrition from birth to 12 months, focusing on reducing the risk of allergies and promoting healthy growth.

Product Features:
â­ Specialized formula for infants with milk protein allergy.
â­ Supports neurocognitive and visual development.
â­ Provides effective digestive protection and reduces intestinal inflammation.
â­ Contributes to promoting healthy vision and eye development.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Biomil Plus HA**:
â­ Consult your doctor or nutritionist to determine the appropriate quantity based on your child's age and needs.
â­ Before preparation, wash your hands thoroughly and use clean, dry tools (bottle, nipple, spoon).
â­ Heat clean water to approximately 40Â°C (104Â°F).
â­ Follow the instructions on the package to accurately measure the amount of powder.
â­ Add the powder to the lukewarm water and gently shake the bottle until completely dissolved.
â­ Check the milk's temperature before feeding your baby.
â­ Store prepared milk in the refrigerator and use within the specified hours according to the manufacturer's instructions.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Biomil Plus HA**:
â­ Specialized blend of hydrolyzed proteins to reduce allergens.
â­ Contains essential fatty acids for brain and vision development (DHA & ARA).
â­ Essential vitamins and minerals to support overall growth.
â­ Probiotics to support gut health and immunity.

#babyformula #infantnutrition #milkallergy #biomil #childgrowth #babyshealth #SaudiBabies #babycare #babyessentials #pediatrics

description_en:
Discover comfort for your little one with **Biomil Plus AR**, the specialized infant formula meticulously designed to manage regurgitation in babies. **Biomil Plus AR** provides balanced and nutritious feeding for infants from birth to 12 months, focusing on reducing regurgitation episodes with its balanced protein ratios and optimal fatty acid profile for healthy development. We ensure your baby receives essential nutrients for their growth and development. Brand: Biomil.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Biomil Plus AR**
â­ Always consult a healthcare professional for guidance on using **Biomil Plus AR** based on your baby's specific needs.
â­ Prepare the formula carefully according to package instructions, adhering to strict hygiene practices.
â­ Feed your baby as directed by a healthcare professional and ensure the formula is at a suitable temperature.
â­ Monitor your baby's progress regularly and consult a specialist for any concerns.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Biomil Plus AR**
â­ Specialized formula for regurgitation management.
â­ Balanced protein ratios (casein and whey).
â­ Optimal fatty acid profile for healthy development.
â­ Complete and balanced nutrition.

#BiomilPlusAR #InfantFormula #BabyNutrition #BabyCare #InfantCare #HealthyBaby #BabyFood #SaudiMoms #PediatricNutrition #BabyHealth

shortdescription_en: Biomil Plus AR: Specialized formula to ease regurgitation, offering optimal nutrition for healthy growth from birth to 12 months.

title_en: Biomil Plus Baby Milk (1) 400 gm - Complete Nutrition for Healthy Growth
title_ar: Ø¨ÙŠÙˆÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ø¨Ù„Ø³ Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ (1) 400 Ø¬Ù… - ØªØºØ°ÙŠØ© Ù…ØªÙƒØ§Ù…Ù„Ø© Ù„Ù†Ù…Ùˆ ØµØ­ÙŠ
description_en:
**Biomil Plus Baby Milk (1)** is the ideal formula to support your baby's healthy growth from birth to 6 months when breastfeeding is not applied.

While breast milk is the best nutrition for babies, **Biomil Plus Baby Milk (1)** offers an advanced formula rich in essential vitamins and minerals for your baby's growth and development during this crucial stage.

â­ Contains Iron to support cognitive development.
â­ Rich in Omega-3 to support brain and eye development.
â­ Vitamin D and Calcium for strong bones and teeth.
â­ Provides complete care to meet your baby's nutritional needs.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Biomil Plus Baby Milk (1)**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparing.
â­ Sterilize all feeding utensils by boiling for 5 minutes.
â­ Boil clean drinking water and let it cool to a suitable temperature.
â­ Use the provided scoop to add the correct amount of powder according to the feeding guide.
â­ Mix well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Close the can tightly after each use and store in a cool, dry place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Biomil Plus Baby Milk (1)**:
â­ Whey Protein Concentrate.
â­ Skimmed Cow's Milk Powder.
â­ Palm Olein, Lactose.
â­ Rapeseed Oil, Coconut Oil, Sunflower Oil.
â­ Maltodextrin.
â­ Fish Oil (from Tuna).
â­ Emulsifier (Soy Lecithin).
â­ Vegetable Oil.
â­ L-Phenylalanine, Bifidus Culture, Taurine.
â­ L-Histidine, Inositol.
â­ Essential Vitamins and Minerals.

#BiomilPlus #BabyMilk #InfantNutrition #BabyGrowth #BabyHealth #SaudiArabia #FormulaMilk #Newborn #Breastfeeding #SaudiMoms

description_en:
Product Description:

**Biomil Baby Milk LF** is a specialized lactose-free infant formula, meticulously crafted for the dietary management of lactose intolerance, addressing maldigestion and diarrhea. It is suitable for use from birth onwards, providing safe and appropriate nutrition for your little one.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Biomil Baby Milk LF**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparing your baby's milk feed.
â­ Wash the bottle or cup, teat, and cap carefully until no milk residue remains. Boil all utensils for five minutes. Keep covered until use.
â­ Boil fresh drinking water for five minutes and allow it to cool to a lukewarm temperature.
â­ Use only the scoop provided in this container and level off the powder using the inner rim.
â­ Add the exact number of level scoops as per the feeding table on the can.
â­ Stir the contents of the cup or shake the capped bottle well until the formula is fully dissolved.
â­ Close the can tightly after each use and store it in a cool, dry place. The product must be used within 4 weeks of opening.
â­ Warning: Prepare only one bottle at a time. Feed immediately and follow the instructions exactly. Do not keep unfinished portions and discard the contents. Always hold your baby while feeding; leaving the baby unattended may cause choking.
â­ Warning: Unboiled water, unboiled bottles, or incorrect dilution can make your baby ill. Incorrect storage, handling, preparation, and feeding can potentially lead to adverse effects on your baby's health. Consult a healthcare professional before use and for guidance on the correct preparation method.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Biomil Baby Milk LF**:
â­ Corn syrup, Palm olein, Whey protein (from Cowâ€™s milk), Low erucic acid rapeseed oil, Coconut oil, Casein, Sunflower oil, Emulsifier soy lecithin, Acidity regulator citric acid E330.
â­ Vegetable oil from Crypthecodinium cohnii with DHA, Vegetable oil from Mortierella alpina with ARA, Choline, Lactobacillus reuteri (DSM 17938*), Inositol, Taurine, L-Carnitine, Nucleotides, Vitamins & Minerals. Contains Milk, Soy, and Corn.

#Biomil #BabyFormula #LactoseFree #InfantNutrition #BabyCare #SaudiMoms #HealthyBaby #BabyMilk #Pediatrics #KSA

description_en:
Achieve your perfect, long-lasting hairstyle with **Taft Power Wax**! This hair wax is specially formulated to provide you with ultimate hold and a healthy shine, leaving your hair looking fresh and glossy. With a gel-like consistency and wax properties, **Taft Power Wax** delivers a luxurious shine without leaving hair dry or frizzy; instead, it protects it from dryness and gives you a professional salon-like look.

â­ 48-hour ultra-strong hold.
â­ Lightweight gel texture with a healthy shine effect.
â­ Protects hair from dryness and maintains its softness.
â­ Provides your hair with an ideal look and unmatched hold.
â­ Helps you achieve shiny and attractive hair.
â­ Easy to distribute and wash out.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Taft Power Wax**:
â­ For best results, it is recommended to apply to damp hair.
â­ Dispense an appropriate amount into your palm.
â­ Distribute the wax evenly throughout the length and width of your hair.
â­ Style your hair as desired and wait for the hold to set.
â­ Wash your hair after use to ensure all residue is removed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Taft Power Wax**:
â­ Contains proven ingredients that provide hair with a shiny and healthy hold.
â­ Innovative formula that maintains hair moisture and protects it from external factors.
â­ A unique blend of wax and gel for an exceptional styling experience.

#Taft #HairWax #HairHold #Hairstyles #ShinyHair #HairProducts #HairCare #HairStyle #Jeddah #Riyadh

description_en: Experience the ultimate hold with **Taft Ultimate Hair Hold Spray**, delivering the highest hold ever for perfect fixation and a luminous liquid crystal gloss effect that leaves your hair luxuriously radiant! This spray is ideal for all hair types, helping you achieve your desired hairstyle for up to 3 days without any stickiness or residue. It provides 4 times more hold compared to other hair care products and helps protect your hair from drying out without weighing it down. Enjoy a flawless style that lasts, protected from humidity and wind, and easily brushes out. **Taft Ultimate Hair Hold Spray** is your go-to for everyday grooming and all styling needs.

description_en:
Unleash ultimate styling power with **Taft V12 Power Gel Speed Hold**. This unique gel offers complete control to sculpt any hairstyle you imagine, even with the most unmanageable hair. Its intensely thick formula ensures long-lasting hold in all conditions, making it perfect for taming difficult locks. Enjoy fast-drying, residue-free, and non-sticky application, while keeping your hair healthy and vibrant.

â­ **Taft V12 Power Gel Speed Hold** is fast-drying and resistant to humid climates.
â­ Perfect for use in hot, sunny weather.
â­ Holds your style all day long, ideal for everyday grooming needs.
â­ Appeals to both men and women.
â­ Its hydrating and nourishing fast-drying formulation eliminates flakiness.
â­ Easy to distribute and easy to wash out.
â­ Hairstyle is set for 72 hours.
â­ Used for wrap styling, hot curling, blow-drying, and all other hair styles you need.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Taft V12 Power Gel Speed Hold**
â­ Squirt some gel into your palm and spread it over the hair.
â­ Comb to the desired style or shape with your fingers.
â­ Gently cleanses and leaves hair looking healthy and vibrant.

description_en:
Discover ultimate hair power with **Taft Caffeine Hair Hold Spray**! This super strong spray provides your hairstyle with the final kick and ultimate hold, lasting up to 72 hours without any stickiness or residue. Its advanced caffeine formula ensures a powerful hold, protects your hair from drying, and resists humidity and wind, making it ideal for all hair types and daily styling needs.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Taft Caffeine Hair Hold Spray**:
â­ Spray from a 30 cm distance evenly all over your style for total hold.
â­ For an individual look, spray selectively on separated hair strands.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Taft Caffeine Hair Hold Spray**:
â­ Caffeine strength formula for a powerful hold.
â­ Protects hair from drying and maintains style.
â­ Easy to distribute and wash out.
â­ Leaves no residue or stickiness.
â­ Resists humidity, wind, and UV rays.

#Taft #HairSpray #HairStyling #StrongHold #HealthyHair #HairCare #Hairstyles #Caffeine #HairLacquers #SaudiArabia

title_ar: Ø¨Ø®Ø§Ø® ØªØ«Ø¨ÙŠØª Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± ØªØ§ÙØª ÙƒÙŠØ±Ø§ØªÙŠÙ† - Ø«Ø¨Ø§Øª Ø­ØªÙ‰ 72 Ø³Ø§Ø¹Ø©
description_en:
Achieve your perfect hairstyle with **Taft Keratin Hair Hold Spray**.

Say goodbye to hairstyles that fall flat! **Taft Keratin Hair Hold Spray** features an innovative Phyto-Keratin formula with hair-identical liquid keratin components. This unique blend strengthens your hair strands, providing a powerful, long-lasting hold of up to 72 hours without any sticky feeling or residue. Perfect for all hair types, it helps you achieve your desired look every time. **Taft Keratin Hair Hold Spray** offers up to 4 times more hold compared to other hair care products and protects your hair from drying out without weighing it down.

â­ Phyto-Keratin formula for strengthened hair.
â­ Delivers up to 72 hours hold without stickiness.
â­ Protects hair from drying out and doesn't weigh it down.
â­ Shields your hairstyle from humidity and wind.
â­ Leaves no residue and is easy to brush out.
â­ Suitable for men and women, for daily use.
â­ Easy to distribute and wash out.
â­ Ideal for all styling techniques like wrapping, hot curling, and blow-drying.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Taft Keratin Hair Hold Spray**:
â­ Spray evenly from a 30 cm distance all over your style for total hold.
â­ For an individual look, spray selectively on separated hair strands.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Taft Keratin Hair Hold Spray**:
â­ Contains hair-identical liquid keratin components.
â­ Gentle formula that provides the desired hold.

#Taft #HairSpray #HairHold #Keratin #HairCare #Hairstyles #HealthyHair #Beauty #SaudiArabia #HairFragrance
